K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:98a-10: de nas de bzhin gshegs pa mi bskyod pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:98a-11: de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen 'byung ldan dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:98a-12: de bzhin gshegs pa spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang po'i rgyal po dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:98b-0: de bzhin gshegs pa gdon mi za bar grub pa rnams de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad du so so nas bdag @98b nyid kyis byin gyis brlabs te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:98b-1: bcom ldan 'das sh'akya thub pa de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad mnyam pa nyid du rab tu rtogs pa'i phyir /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:98b-2: phyogs thams cad mnyam pa nyid du dmigs nas phyogs bzhir bzhugs so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:98b-3: de nas bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad de bzhin gshegs pa mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas ring po ma lon pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:98b-4: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi thugs kun tu bzang po zhes bya ba /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:98b-5: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi nam mkha' las byung ba'i nor bu rin po che chen po'i dbang gis dbang bskur ba /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:98b-6: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kun tu spyan ras gzigs kyis dbang po'i chos kyi ye shes dam pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa brnyes pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:98b-7: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi 'phrin las thams cad gdon mi za bar ston pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:98b-10: yid kyi bsam ba'o cog yongs su rdzogs pas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad du bdag nyid kyis byin gyis brlabs nas /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:98b-11: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi byang chub sems dpa' chen po kun tu bzang po zhes bya ba'i dam tshig las byung ba sems dpa'i byin gyis brlabs ba'i rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:99a-0: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi theg pa chen po mngon @99a *//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:99a-1: par rtogs pa zhes bya ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi snying po 'di rang gi thugs ka nas phyung ngo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:99a-3: de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi thugs ka nas byung ma thag pa 'di ni bcom ldan 'das kun tu bzang po de nyid /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:99a-4: zla ba'i dkyil 'khor du gyur nas byung ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:99a-5: sems can thams cad kyi byang chub kyi sems chen po yang dag par sbyangs nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi phyogs phyogs su 'khod do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:99a-6: de nas zla ba'i dkyil 'khor de dag las kyang de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ye shes kyi rdo rje byung ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:99a-7: bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad de bzhin gshegs pa'i thugs su zhugs par gyur to //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:99a-8: rdo rje sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin ni shin tu brtan pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:99a-9: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi byin gyis brlabs kyis gcig tu 'bres par gyur nas nam mkha'i khams thams cad du 'od zer rtse lnga pa'i phreng bas khyab par zhugs te de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:99a-11: thugs rdo rje lta bu'i dbyings su gyur nas /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:99a-12: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi thugs ka nas byung ste phyag gnyis su gnas so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:99a-13: de nas rdo rje de las rdo rje de lta bu'i 'od zer gzugs dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:99b-0: kha dog sna tshogs pa 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du snang bas khyab par byed pa rnams byung @99b bo; ;rdo rje lta bu'i 'od zer de dag gi rtse mo las 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi rdul shin tu phra mo snyed kyi de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi sku byung ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:99b-1: chos kyi dbyings kun tu khyab pa thams cad dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:99b-2: nam mkha'i khams kyi mthas gtugs pa thams cad dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:99b-3: 'jig rten gyi khams rab 'byams rgya mtsho'i sprin thams cad du de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:99b-4: mnyam pa nyid kyi ye shes mngon par byang chub pas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi byang chub kyi sems chen po bskyed pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:99b-5: kun tu bzang po'i spyod pa sna tshogs grub pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:99b-6: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rigs mnyes bar mdzad pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:99b-7: byang chub kyi snying po chen por gshegs pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:99b-9: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi mnyam pa nyid kyi byang chub chen por mngon par byang chub pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:99b-10: dam pa'i chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba nas /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:99b-11: ji srid sems can gyi khams ma lus shing lus pa med pa rnams yongs su skyob cing thams cad la phan pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:99b-13: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ye shes dang; mngon par shes pa dam pa'i dngos grub bsgrub pa la sogs pa de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdzu 'phrul dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:99b-14: cho 'phrul rnams kyi bar du bstan nas /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:100a-1: dpa'i ting nge 'dzin ni kun tu bzang po yin pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:100a-2: shin tu brtan pa'i phyir gcig tu 'dres par gyur nas byang chub sems dpa' chen po kun tu bzang po'i skur gyur te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:100a-3: bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyi thugs la gnas nas /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:100a-4: 'di skad du ched du brjod pa 'di ched du brjod do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:100a-5: ae ma ho bdag ni rang byung ba'i //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:100a-6: kun tu bzang po sems dpa' brtan //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:100a-7: de ni brtan phyir lus min yang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:100a-8: sems dpa'i lus su gyur pa yin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:100a-9: de nas byang chub sems dpa' chen po kun tu bzang po'i sku bcom ldan 'das kyi thugs ka nas byung ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:100a-10: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi spyan sngan zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la gnas nas bka' nod cing bzhugs par gyur to //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:100a-11: de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ting nge 'dzin dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:100a-12: ye shes kyi dam tshig rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:100a-13: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi tshul khrims dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:100a-17: rnam par grol ba'i ye shes mthong ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:100a-18: chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:100a-19: sems can gyi don bya ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:100a-23: ye shes chen po'i dam tshig dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:100b-0: sems can gyi khams ma lus shing lus pa med pa rnams yongs su bskyab @100b ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:100b-1: thams cad kyi dbang por bya ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:100b-2: thams cad kyi bde ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:100b-3: yid bde ba myong bar bya ba nas /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:100b-4: ji srid de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi mnyam pa nyid kyi ye shes dang mngon par shes pa bla na med pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:100b-5: theg pa chen po mngon par rtogs par grub pa'i mchog thob pa'i par du 'bras bu de dag gi phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po kun tu bzang po de /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:100b-6: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi 'khor los bsgyur pa nyid du sangs rgyas thams cad kyi sku rin po che'i dbu rgyan dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:100b-7: cod pan gyi dbang gis dbang bskur nas /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:100b-8: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi grub pa'i rdo rje de de'i lag par byin no //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:100b-9: de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:100b-11: lag na rdo rje zhes bya ba'i rdo rje'i ming gi dbang gis dbang bskur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:100b-12: de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rje phyag g-yon pa rdo rje bsgyings par bzhugs te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:100b-13: phyag g-yas pas rdo rje thugs kar gsor zhing 'phen pa'i tshul du 'dzin cing ched du brjod pa 'di ched du brjod do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:100b-14: sangs rgyas kun gyi grub pa yi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:100b-15: rdo rje bla na med pa 'di //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:100b-16: bdag ste bdag gi lag tu byin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:100b-17: rdo rje la ni rdo rje gnas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:101a-0: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gdon mi za ba'i rgyal po'i dam tshig las byung ba'i sems dpa'i byin gyis @101a *//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:101a-1: brlabs pa'i rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi spyan drang ba'i dam tshig ces bya ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi snying po 'di rang gi thugs ka nas phyung ngo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:101a-3: de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi thugs ka nas byung ma thag pa 'di ni bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rje de nyid do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:101a-4: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi lcags kyu chen por gyur te byung nas /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:101a-5: bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyi thugs su zhugs te gcig tu 'dres par gyur nas /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:101a-6: rdo rje lcags kyu chen po'i dbyibs su gyur te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:101a-7: bcom ldan 'das kyi phyag gnyis su gnas so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:101a-8: de nas rdo rje lcags kyu'i dbyibs chen po de las 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi rdul shin tu phra mo dang mnyam pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku rnams byung ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:101a-9: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad spyan drang ba la sogs pa sangs rgyas thams cad kyi rdzu 'phrul dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:101a-10: cho 'phrul rnams byas nas rdo rje sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin ni shin tu gdon ni za ba'i rgyal po yin pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:101a-11: shin tu brtan pa'i phyir gcig tu 'dres par gyur te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:101a-12: byang chub sems dpa' chen po shin tu gdon mi za ba'i lus su gyur nas /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:101b-0: bcom ldan 'das @101b rnam par snang mdzad kyi thugs la gnas te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:101b-1: ched du brjod pa 'di ched du brjod do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:101b-2: ae ma'o rdo rje las byung ba'i //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:101b-3: lcags kyu nges pa'i rgyal po bdag /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:101b-4: gang phyir kun tu sangs rgyas khyab; ;grub phyir kun nas spyan 'dren to //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:101b-5: de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shin tu gdon mi za ba'i rgyal po'i sku bcom ldan 'das kyi thugs ka nas byung ste; de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi g-yas phyogs kyi zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la gnas nas bka' nod cing bzhugs par gyur to //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:101b-6: de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad spyan 'dren pa'i dam tshig gi rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:101b-7: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad spyan 'dren pa'i dam tshig dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:101b-8: sems can gyi khams ma lus shing lus pa med pa thams cad dgug pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:101b-9: thams cad kyi bde ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:101b-10: yid bde ba myong bar bya ba nas /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:101b-11: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad 'du ba'i byin gyis brlabs dam pa'i bar du bsgrub pa'i phyir rdo rje'i lcags kyu de byang chub sems dpa' gdon mi za ba'i rgyal po de'i lag par de bzhin du byin no; ;de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis rdo rje dgug pa rdo rje dgug pa zhes bya ba'i rdo rje'i ming gi dbang gis dbang bskur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:102a-0: de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems @102a *//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:102a-1: dpa' chen po rdo rje dgug pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:102a-2: rdo rje lcags kyu des de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad spyan 'dren cing ched du brjod pa 'di ched du brjod do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:102a-3: sangs rgyas kun gyi rdo rje yi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:102a-4: ye shes bla na med pa 'di //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:102a-5: sangs rgyas kun gyi don grub phyir //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:102a-6: kun nas spyan drangs dam pa'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:102a-7: de nas bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' chen po bdud ces bya ba'i dam tshig las byung ba'i sems dpa'i byin gyis brlabs rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:102a-8: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad mnyes par byed pa'i dam tshig ces bya ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi snying po 'di rang gi thugs ka nas phyung ngo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:102a-10: de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi thugs las byung ma thag pa 'di ni /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:102a-11: bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin pa de nyid de /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:102a-12: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi me tog gi dmar gyur nas byung ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:102a-13: bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyi thugs su zhugs te gcig tu 'dres par gyur nas rdo rje'i mda' chen po'i dbyibs su gyur te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:102a-15: de nas rdo rje ma da'i dbyibs de las 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi rdul shin tu phra mo dang mnyam pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku rnams byung ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:102b-0: de bzhin gshegs pa @102b thams cad mnyes par bya ba la sogs pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:102b-1: sangs rgyas thams cad kyi rdzu 'phrul dang cho 'phrul rnams byas nas rdo rje sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin shin tu bdud byed ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:102b-2: rab tu brtan pa'i phyir gcig tu 'dres par gyur nas /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:102b-3: byang chub sems dpa' chen po bdud ces bya bar gyur te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:102b-4: bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyi thugs la gnas nas ched du brjod pa 'di ched du brjod do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:102b-5: ae ma'o bdag ni rang bzhin dag /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:102b-6: rang byung ba dag dgyes byed pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:102b-7: 'dod chags bral rnams dag bya'i phyir //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:102b-9: de nas byang chub sems dpa' chen po bdud de'i lus bcom ldan 'das kyi thugs ka nas byung ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:102b-10: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi g-yon phyogs kyi zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la gnas nas yang bka' nod cing bzhugs par gyur to //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:102b-11: de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad mnyes par byed pa'i byin gyis brlabs pa'i rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:102b-12: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdud rdo rje'i dam tshig dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:102b-13: sems can gyi khams ma lus shing lus pa med pa rnams mgu bar bya ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:102b-14: thams cad kyi bde ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:102b-15: yid bde ba myong bar bya ba nas /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:103a-0: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdud kyi mchog grub @103a *//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:103a-1: pa thong ba'i bar du 'bras bu de dag gi phyir rdo rje'i mda' de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bdud ces bya ba de'i lag tu de bzhin du byin no; ;de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis rdo rje'i gzhu /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:103a-2: rdo rje'i gzhu zhes bya ba'i rdo rje'i ming gi dbang gis dbang bskyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:103a-3: de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rdo rje'i gzhu zhes bya bas rdo rje'i mda' des de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la bdud byed cing ched du brjod pa 'di ched du brjod do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:103a-4: sangs rgyas kun gyi 'dod chags kyi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:103a-5: ye shes 'di ni dri ma med //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:103a-6: 'dod chags kyis ni chags bral bcom //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:103a-7: bde ba thams cad sbyin bar byed //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:103a-8: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rab tu dga' ba'i rgyal po'i dam tshig las byung ba'i sems dpa'i byin gyis brlabs pa'i rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:103a-9: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rab tu dga' ba'i dam tshig ces bya ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi snying po 'di rang gi thugs ka nas phyung ngo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:103a-11: de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi thugs las byung ma thag pa 'di ni /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:103b-0: bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin pa de nyid de legs so zhes bya bar gyur nas bcom ldan 'das @103b rnam par snang mdzad kyi thugs su zhugs te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:103b-1: gcig tu 'dres bar gyur nas rdo rje dgyes pa'i dbyibs su gyur te phyag gnyis su gnas so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:103b-2: de nas rdo rje dgyes ba'i dbyibs de las 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi rdul shin tu phra mo dang mnyam pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku rnams byung nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis legs so zhes bya ba la sogs pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:103b-3: sangs rgyas thams cad kyi rdzu 'phrul dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:103b-5: rdo rje sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin ni shin tu dga' bar byed pa nyid dang /

K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:104a-1: gshegs pa thams cad mnyes par byed pa'i rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas /

K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:104a-8: de nas byang chub sems dpa' chen po rdo rje dgyes pas rdo rje dgyes pa'i dbyibs des de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la legs so zhes bya bas rab tu dgyes par byed cing //

K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:104b-7: bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin ba de nyid de nam mkha' thams cad kyi 'od zer su gyur nas byung ngo //

K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:109a-6: ae ma'o bdag ni kun mchog gi /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:109a-7: bzhad chen rmad du byung ba yin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:109a-8: de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag par dga' zhing rab tu mgu ba'i dbang po'i lus bcom ldan 'das kyi thugs las byung nas /

K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:109a-11: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rmad du byung ba bskyed pa'i dam tshig dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:109a-12: sems can gyi khams ma lus shing lus pa med pa thams cad kyi dbang po bla na med pa bya ba dang /

K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:109b-0: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dbang po yongs su sbyong ba'i ya shes mngon par thob pa'i @109b bar du 'bras bu de dag gi phyir byang chub sems dpa' chen po rtag par dga' zhing rab tu mgu ba'i dbang po de'i lag tu rdo rje 'dzum pa de de bzhin du byin no //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:109b-1: de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje dga' ba /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:109b-2: rdo rje dga' ba zhes rdo rje'i ming gi dbang gis dbang bskur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:109b-3: de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rdo rje'i dga' bas rdo rje 'dzum pa des de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dgyes par byed cing /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:109b-4: ched du brjod pa 'di ched du brjod do //

K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:109b-6: rmad byung skyed pa ston pa po //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:109b-7: dgyes chen byed pa'i ye shes te //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:109b-8: gtsug lag gzhan gyis shes mi nus //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:109b-9: dbang bskur ba chen po dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:109b-11: sems dpa' chen po'i don dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:109b-13: 'di bzhin ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dbang chen po'i sems dpa'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:109b-14: de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po kun tu spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang po'i dam tshig las byung ba'i chos kyi byin gyis brlabs pa'i rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting de 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas /

K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:110a-3: de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad gyi thugs las byung ma thag pa 'di ni /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:110a-4: bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin pa de nyid de /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:110a-5: rdo rje sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin ni rang bzhin gyis dag pa'i chos mnyam pa nyid kyi ye shes rab tu togs [?] pa'i phyir dam pa'i chos kyi 'od zer du gyur te byung ngo; ;dam pa'i chos kyi 'od zer de dag gis 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kun tu snang bar byas nas chos kyi dbyings kyi rang bzhin du gyur to //

K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:110a-7: nam mkha'i khams thams cad dang mnyam par 'jug pa'i tshad tsam gyi rdo rje padma chen po'i dbyibs su gyur te phyag gnyis su gnas so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:110a-8: de nas rdo rje padma'i dbyibs de las 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi rdul shin tu phra mo dang mnyam ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku rnams byung ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:110a-9: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ting nge 'dzin dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:110a-11: mngon par shes pa la sogs pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:110a-12: sangs rgyas thams cad kyi rdzu 'phrul dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:110a-13: cho 'phrul rnams 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad khyab par byas nas /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:110b-0: rdo rje sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin ni @110b kun tu spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang po yin ba dang /

K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:110b-6: dam pa'i don ni bdag yin te //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:110b-7: gang phyir gzings 'dra'i chos rnams las //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:110b-8: rnam par dag pa dmigs par gyur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:110b-9: de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po kun tu spyan ras gzigs kyi lus de bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyi thugs las byung ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:110b-10: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi spyan sngan zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la gnas te yang bka' nod cing bzhugs par gyur to //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:110b-11: de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ting nge 'dzin mnyam pa nyid kyi ye shes dam tshig las byung ba rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas /

K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:110b-14: gzhan rnam par dag par bya ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:110b-15: thams cad kyi bde ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:110b-16: yid bde ba myong bar bya ba nas /

K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:111a-8: 'dod chags rnam par dag cing ma chags pa'i ngo bo nyid du gzigs pas gzigs shing /

K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:111b-2: de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi thugs las byung ma thag pa 'di ni /

K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:111b-5: ye shes kyi ral gri rgyur te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:111b-6: de byung nas bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyi thugs su zhugs te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:111b-8: rdo rje ral gri'i dbyibs su gyur te bcom ldan 'das kyi phyag gnyis su gnas so //

K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:114a-8: rdo rje brjod pa'i dbyibs su gyur te phyag gnyis su gnas so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:114a-9: de nas rdo rje brjod pa'i dbyibs de las 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi rdul shin tu phra mo dang mnyam pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku rnams byung nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi chos nyid la sogs pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:114a-10: sangs rgyas thams cad kyi rdzu 'phrul dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:114a-11: cho 'phrul la sogs pa byas nas /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:114a-12: rdo rje sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin ni shin tu tshig ma yin pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:114a-13: shin tu brtan pa'i phyir gcig tu 'dres par gyur nas /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:114b-0: byang chub sems dpa' chen po tshig ma yin pa'i skur gyur nas bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyi thugs la gnas @114b nas; ched du brjod pa 'di ched du brjod do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:114b-1: ae ma'o rang byung rnams kyi gsang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:114b-2: ldem po dag tu bdag dgongs te //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:114b-3: gang phyir dam pa'i chos 'chad pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:114b-4: tshig tu spros las rnam par bral //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:114b-5: de nas byang chub sems dpa' chen po tshig ma yin pa'i sku de bcom ldan 'das kyi thugs las byung nas /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:114b-6: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rgyab na zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la gnas nas yang bka' nod cing bzhugs par gyur to //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:114b-7: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi mi gsung ba'i gsung gi rdo rje'i dam tshig las byung ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:114b-8: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gsung gi ye shes kyi dam tshig dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:114b-9: sems can gyi khams ma lus shing lus pa med pa rnams kyi tshig grub pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:114b-10: thams cad kyi bde ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:114b-11: yid bde ba myong bar bya ba nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gsung gi gsang ba thob pa'i dngos grub dam pa'i bar gyi phyir rdo rje brjod pa de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshig ma yin pa de'i lag tu de bzhin du byin no //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:114b-12: de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis rdo rje'i tshig /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:114b-13: rdo rje'i tshig ces bya ba'i rdo rje ming gi dbang gis dbang bskur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:115a-0: de nas byang chub sems dpa' chen po rdo rje'i tshig gis de @115a *//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:115a-1: bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la rdo rje'i brjod pas yang dag par smra zhing ched du brjod pa 'di ched du brjod do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:115a-2: 'di ni sangs rgyas thams cad kyi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:115a-3: rdo rje'i bzlas par brjod pa yin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:115a-4: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:115a-6: rdo rje chos nyid kyi ye shes //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:115a-7: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi shes rab kyi ye shes dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:115a-8: chos kyi 'khor lo chen po bskor ba'i ye shes dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:115a-9: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gsung gi spros pa rnam par ldog pa'i ye shes dang 'di bzhi ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ye shes kyi sems dpa'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:115a-10: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi byang chub sems dpa' chen po'i 'phrin las thams cad pa zhes bya ba'i dam tshig las byung ba /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:115a-11: las kyi byin gyis brlabs pa'i rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:115a-12: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi 'phrin las kyi dam tshig ces bya ba de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi snying po 'di rang gi thugs ka nas phyung ngo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:115a-14: de nas rdo rje sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin las thams cad mnyam pa nyid kyi ye shes shin tu rtogs pa'i phyir /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:115b-0: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi thugs las byung ma thag pa @115b 'di ni /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:115b-1: bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin pa de nyid de /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:115b-2: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi 'phrin las kyi 'od zer gyur te byung nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi 'phrin las kyi 'od zer de dag gis 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad snang bar byas nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi 'phrin las kyi dbyibs lta bur gyur to //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:115b-3: de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi 'phrin las kyi dbyibs de yang bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyi thugs su zhugs te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:115b-4: nam mkha'i dbyings thams cad du mnyam par 'jug pa'i tshad tsam du gyur to //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:115b-5: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi 'phrin las kyi dbyibs de las /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:115b-6: las thams cad kyi rdo rje'i dbyibs su gyur nas phyag gnyis su gnas so; ;de nas rdo rje'i dbyibs de las 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi rdul shin tu phra mo dang mnyam pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku rnams byung nas /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:115b-7: 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi 'phrin las la sogs pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:115b-8: sangs rgyas thams cad kyi rdzu 'phrul dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:115b-10: rdo rje sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi 'phrin nlas mtha' yas pa yin pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:115b-11: shin tu brtan pa'i phyir gcig tu 'dres par gyur te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:116a-1: dpa' chen po de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi 'phrin las thams cad ces bya ba'i skur gyur te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:116a-2: bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyi thugs la gnas nas /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:116a-3: ched du brjod pa 'di ched du brjod do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:116a-4: ae ma'o sangs rgyas rnams kyi nges //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:116a-5: 'phrin las mang po kun bdag yin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:116a-6: sangs rgyas don ni lhun grub phyir; ;rdo rje las ni 'jug par 'gyur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:116a-7: de nas byang chub sems dpa' chen po de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi 'phrin las thams cad ces bya ba'i lus bcom ldan 'das kyi thugs las byung nas /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:116a-8: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi spyan sngar zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la gnas nas /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:116a-9: yang bka' nod cing bzhugs par gyur to //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:116a-10: de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gdon mi za ba'i dam tshig las byung ba'i rdo rje'i byin gyis brlabs pa'i rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:116a-11: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad mchod par bya ba la sogs pa gdon mi za ba'i tshad med pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:116a-12: las kyi cho ga rgyas pa thams cad kyi dam tshig dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:116a-13: sems can gyi khams ma lus shing lus pa med pa rnams kyis las thams cad grub pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:116a-14: thams cad kyi bde ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:116a-15: yid bde ba myong bar bya ba nas /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:116b-0: de bzhin gshegs @116b pa thams cad kyi rdo rje'i 'phrin las nyid dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:116b-2: mngon par shes pa dam pa rnams 'grub pa'i bar du 'bras bu de dag gi phyir /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:116b-3: byang chub sems dpa' chen po de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi 'phrin las thams cad kyi 'khor los bsgyur bar de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje'i dbang gis dbang bskur nas de'i lag tu las kyi rdo rje de de bzhin du byin no //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:116b-4: de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis rdo rje thams cad /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:116b-5: rdo rje thams cad ces bya ba'i rdo rje'i ming gi dbang gis dbang bskur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:116b-6: de nas byang chub sems dpa' chen po rdo rje thams cad ces bya bas rdo rje de rang gi snying gar bzhag ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:116b-7: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi 'phrin las la sbyor zhing ched du brjod pa 'di ched du brjod do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:116b-8: 'di ni sangs rgyas thams cad kyi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:116b-9: las rnams thams cad byed pa'i mchog /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:116b-10: bdag ste bdag gi lag tu byin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:116b-11: sna tshogs la ni sna tshogs gzhag /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:116b-12: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' chen po brtson 'grus thub dka'i dam tshig las byung ba las thams cad kyi byin gyis brlabs pa'i rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:117a-0: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi srung ba'i dam tshig ces bya ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi snying po 'di rang gi thugs ka nas phyung @117a *//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:117a-2: de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi thugs las phyung ma thag pa 'di ni /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:117a-3: bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rje de nyid de /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:117a-4: go cha brtan par gyur te byung nas /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:117a-5: bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyi thugs su zhugs te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:117a-7: rdo rje go cha chen po'i dbyibs su gyur te phyag gnyis su gnas so //

K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:117a-13: shin tu brtan pa'i phyir gcig tu 'dres par gyur te /

K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:117a-15: bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyi thugs la gnas te ched du brjod pa 'di ched du brjod do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:117a-16: ae ma'o brtson 'grus go cha ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:117a-17: brtan pa'i bdag nyid rab brtan bdag /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:117a-18: de ni brtan phyir lus med kyang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:117a-19: rdo rje'i lus su byed pa mchog /

K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:117b-13: brtson 'grus brtan pas bsrung ba che //

K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:118b-0: shin tu brtan pa'i phyir gcig tu @118b 'dres par gyur te /

K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:119a-3: rdo rje khro bo zhes rdo rje'i ming gi dbang gis dbang bskur ro; ;de nas byang chub sems dpa' chen po rdo rje khro bos rdo rje mche ba'i mtshon cha de rang gi thugs kar bzhag ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:119a-4: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la bsngags shing ched du brjod pa 'di ched du brjod do //

K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:119a-14: de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi thugs las phyung ma thag pa 'di ni bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin pa de nyid de /

K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:119b-1: de nas rdo rje bcing ba'i dbyings de las 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi rdul shin tu phra mo dang mnyam pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi sku byung ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:119b-2: 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi phyag rgya dang /

K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:119b-7: rab tu brtan pa'i phyir gcig tu 'dres par gyur te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:119b-8: byang chub sems dpa' chen po de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi khu tshur zhes bya ba'i skur gyur nas /

K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:119b-10: ched du brjod pa 'di ched du brjod do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:119b-11: ae ma'o rab tu brtan bcings pa'i //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:119b-12: dam tshig bdag ste brtan pa'i bdag /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:119b-13: bsam pa thams cad rab grub phyir //

K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:120a-1: yang bka' nod cing bzhugs par gyur to //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:120a-2: de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dam tshig gi rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:120a-3: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi phyag rgya bcing ba'i dam tshig dang /

K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:120a-5: lha rnams kyi dgongs pa brtag pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:120a-7: thams cad kyi bde ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:120a-8: yid bde ba myong bar bya ba nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:120a-9: phyag rgya'i dbang dam pa 'grub pa'i bar du 'bras bu de dag gi phyir rdo rje bcing ba de byang chub sems dpa' chen po de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi khu tshur zhes bya ba'i lag tu de bzhin du byin no //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:120a-10: de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis rdo rje khu tshur /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:120a-11: rdo rje khu tshur zhes rdo rje'i ming gi dbang gis dbang bskur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:120a-12: de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rdo rje khu tshur zhes bya ba des rdo rje bcings pa des de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la 'ching zhing ched du brjod pa 'di ched du brjod do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:120a-13: 'di ni sangs rgyas thams cad kyi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:120a-14: phyag rgya bcing ba che zhing brtan //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:120a-15: sangs rgyas kun gyi myur du phyir //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:120b-0: dam tshig @120b bzhin du 'da' bar dka'//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:120b-1: de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi mchod pa'i cho ga rgyas pa'i las dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:120b-2: brtson 'grus chen po'i go cha brtan pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:120b-3: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi thabs chen po dang phyag rgya thams cad bcings pa'i ye shes dang 'di bzhi ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi 'phrin las chen po'i sems dpa'o ////
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:120b-5: de nas de bzhin gshegs pa mi bskyod pa zhes bya bas de bzhin gshegs pa bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyi de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ye shes bsgrubs te /

K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:120b-9: de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi thugs las phyung ma thag tu /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:120b-10: rdo rje'i 'od zer du gyur nas byung ste bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin pa de nyid do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:121a-0: 'od zer de dag las kyang 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi rdul shin tu phra mo dang mnyam pa'i de bzhin gshegs @121a *//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:121a-1: pa rnams kyi skur gyur nas /

K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:121a-7: sems dpa'i rdo rje brtan pa'i bdag /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:121a-8: gang phyir brtan pas lus med kyang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:121a-9: rdo rje'i lus su gyur pa yin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:121a-10: de nas de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen 'byung ba zhes bya ba de bzhin gshegs pa bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyi de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ye shes la phyag rgyas byin gyis brlabs par bya ba'i phyir rin po che'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i dam tshig las byung ba'i rdo rje'i byin gyis brlabs pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas /

K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:131a-23: rdo rje mche ba 'jigs pa che //

K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:131b-2: bdag cag gis ni bstod pa yin //

K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:131b-6: dkyil 'khor chen po dam pa yi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:131b-7: cho ga mchog ni bshad par gsol //

K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:131b-9: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dam tshig 'byung ba rdo rje'i byin gyis brlabs kyis byin gyis brlabs pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas rdo rje dbyings zhes bya ba'i dkyil 'khor chen po 'di bshad do //

K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:132a-10: de yi rim pa'i nang zhugs la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:132a-12: thig gis yongs su bskor bar bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:132a-13: ka ba brgyad kyis mdzes bgyis pa //

K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:132b-17: ji lta bar ni bka' nod do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:132b-18: de ltar bgyis na bdag ming brjod //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:132b-19: de nas rdo rje bsgrub bgyi ba //

K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:132b-21: rdo rje lcags kyu bcings nas ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:132b-22: se gol mang po brdab bgyis la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:132b-23: sangs rgyas thams cad bsdu bar bgyi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:132b-24: de tshe sangs rgyas thams cad ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:132b-25: rdo rje sems dpa' la sogs bcas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:132b-26: dkyil 'khor thams cad gang ba rnams //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:132b-28: de nas rdo rje sems dpa' yi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:132b-29: phyag rgya chen po sgom phyed cing //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:132b-30: ming brgya rtsa brgyad dam pa ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:132b-31: cung zad rab tu brjod par bgyi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:132b-32: de nas 'dus pa dgyes pas na //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:133a-2: rdo rje sems dpa' rang grub pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:133a-3: grogs po nyid du nye bar gnas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:133a-4: de nas sgo rnams thams cad du //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:133a-5: lcags kyu la sogs las bgyis nas; ;las chen mchog gi phyag rgya yis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:133a-6: dam tshig rnams ni gzhag par bgyi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:133a-7: dam tshig mchog gi phyag rgya dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:133a-8: sems dpa' rdo rje la sogs pas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:133a-9: de ltar sems dpa' chen po bsgrub //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:133a-11: de nas sangs rgyas la sogs pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:133a-12: sems dpa' chen po kun bsdu bar //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:133a-13: spyan drangs nas ni rab tu bcug /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:133a-14: bcings nas de yi dbang du gyur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:133a-15: de nas bdag nyid chen po rnams //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:133a-16: gsang ba'i mchod pas mnyes bgyis la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:133a-17: thams cad don kun grub pa'i phyir //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:133a-18: thams cad mdzod ces gsol bar bgyi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:133a-19: dkyil 'khor thams cad du rdo rje slob dpon gyis de bzhin du las bgyi'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:133a-20: de nas rdo rje dbyings kyi dkyil 'khor chen po 'dir ni rdo rje slob ma dkyil 'khor du gzhug pa la sogs pa'i cho ga rgyas par mchis so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:133a-21: de la dang por ni gzhug pa lags te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:133a-22: sems can gyi khams ma lus shing lus pa med pa rnams yongs su skyabs pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:133a-23: sems can thams cad kyi phan pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:133a-24: bde ba thams cad dngos grub mchog gi rgyu dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:133b-0: @133b dkyil 'khor chen po 'dir gzhug pa la snod du gyur pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:133b-1: snod du ma gyur pa brtag mi 'tshal lo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:133b-4: sems can kha cig ni sdig pa chen po bgyid pa yang mchis te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:133b-5: de dag gis rdo rje dbyings kyi dkyil 'khor chen po der zhugs te mthong na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:133b-6: ngan song thams cad dang bral bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:133b-11: 'dod pa'i yon tan thams cad la chags pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:133b-12: dam tshig la mi dga' ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:133b-13: sngar spyad pa la sogs pa mi nus pa'i sems can dag kyang mchis te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:133b-14: de dag kyang der ji ltar 'tshal ba bzhin du bgyid cing zhugs pa rnams kyi bsam pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:133b-16: sems can kha cig ni gar dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:133b-21: spyod pa la dga' ba rnams de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi theg pa chen po mngon par rtogs pa'i chos nyid khong du ma chud pa la gzhan gyi rigs kyi dkyil 'khor du 'jug gi /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:133b-22: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rigs kyi dkyil 'khor du re ba thams cad yongs su rdzogs pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:133b-23: yang dag par bsdus par gyur pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:133b-24: bla na med pa'i dga' ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:134a-0: rangs pa rnams 'byung bar byed pa de ni @134a *//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:134a-1: bslab pa'i gzhis 'jigs shing skrag nas /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:134a-2: mi 'jug pa dag kyang mchis te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:134a-3: de dag ngan song gi dkyil 'khor gyi lam du 'jug par kha bltas shing gnas pa rnams kyang dga' ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:134a-4: mgu ba'i dam pa thams cad 'grub cing bde ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:134a-5: yid bde ba myong bar bgyi ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:134a-6: ngan song gi rgyud thams cad du 'jug par kha bltas pa'i lam las bzlog par bgyi ba'i slad du rdo rje dbyings kyi dkyil 'khor chen po der 'jug tu rung ngo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:134a-8: chos can gyi sems can de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi tshul khrims dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:134a-10: shes rab kyi dngos grub dam pa'i thabs kyis sangs rgyas rnams kyi byang chub tshol ba na bsam gtan dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:134a-12: sa rnams kyis 'bad cing nyon mongs par gyur pa dag kyang mchis te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:134a-13: de dag kyang rdo rje dbyings kyis dkyil 'khor chen po der zhugs ma thag tu de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad du 'grub par yang rnyed par dka' ba ma lags na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:134a-14: dngos grub gzhan lta smos kyang ci 'tshal /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:134a-15: de la dang po kho nar re zhig de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la phyag bzhi bgyi'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:134a-16: de ni 'di ltar lus thams cad kyis rdo rje thal mo brkyang ste phyag 'tshal zhing sngags 'di skad du /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:134b-0: aom @134b sarbba ta th'a ga ta ph'u dzo pastha n'a ya a'atma nam ni ry'a ta y'a mi /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:134b-1: sarbba ta th'a ga ta badzra satva aa dhi tishtha sva m'am zhes brjod do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:134b-2: de nas de bzhin du 'dug ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:134b-3: rdo rje thal mo snying gar bzhag ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:134b-4: dpral bas phyag 'tshal zhing sngags 'di skad du /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:134b-5: aom sarbba ta th'a ga ta p'u dza aa bhi sha k'a ya a'atma nam ni r'ya ta y'a mi /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:134b-6: sarbba ta th'a ga ta badzra ratna aa bhishi lca m'am zhes brjod do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:134b-7: de nas de bzhin du 'jug ste rdo rje thal mo spyi bor sbyar te khas phyag 'tshal zhing sngags 'di skad du /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:134b-8: aom sarbba ta th'a ga ta p'u dza pra brta n'a ya a'atma nam ni ry'a ta y'a mi /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:134b-9: sarbba ta th'a ga ta badzra dharmma bra brtta ya m'am zhes brjod do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:134b-10: de nas de bzhin du 'dug ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:134b-11: rdo rje thal mo spyi bo nas phab ste snying gar bzhags nas spyi bos phyag 'tshal zhing sngags 'di skad du /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:134b-12: aom sarbba ta th'a ga ta p'u dza karma ne a'atma nam ni ry'a ta y'a mi /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:134b-13: sarbba ta th'a ga ta badzra karma ku ru m'am zhes brjod do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:134b-14: de nas stod g-yogs gos dmar po gyon gdong ras dmar pos dkris nas /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:134b-15: sems dpa' rdo rje ma'i phyag rgya bcings la snying po 'di brjod do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:134b-17: de nas gung mo gnyis kyis me tog gi phreng ba 'dzin du bcug la drang zhing snying po 'di brjod do /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:134b-19: de nas bcug ma thag tu 'di skad du bsgos shig /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:134b-20: deng khyod de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rigs su zhugs kyis /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:135a-0: ngas khyod la ye shes gang gis de @135a *//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:135a-1: bzhin gshegs pa thams cad grub pa yang thob na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:135a-2: dngos grub gzhan lta smos kyang ci dgos te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:135a-3: de lta bu'i rdo rje'i ye shes bskyed par bya yi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:135a-4: khyod kyis dkyil 'khor chen po ma mthong ba rnams la ma smra shig /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:135a-5: dam tshig nyams par gyur ta re //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:135a-6: de nas rdo rje slob dpon gyis sems dpa'i rdo rje'i phyag rgya kha nang du bstan pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:135a-7: phyir bstan pa bcings la rdo rje slob ma'i spyi bor bzhag ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:135a-9: 'di ni khyod kyi rdo rje'i dam tshig yin gyi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:135a-10: gal te 'ga' zhig la smras na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:135a-12: de nas dam tshig gi phyag rgya de nyid dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:135a-13: mna'i chu'i snying pos sngags la slob ma de 'thung du gzhug go //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:135a-14: de la mna'i snying po 'di yin te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:135a-15: rdo rje sems dpa' nyid ni deng //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:135a-16: khyod kyi snying la yang dag zhugs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:135a-17: gal te tshul de smra na ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:135a-18: de ma thag tu dral te gshegs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:135a-20: de nas slob ma la 'di skad du bsgos shig /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:135a-21: deng phyin chad khyod kyi phyag na rdo rje nga yin gyi /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:135a-22: ngas 'di byos shig ces bsgo ba gang yin pa de bya dgos so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:135a-23: khyod kyis nga la brnyas par ma byed cig /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:135a-24: mi bde ba ma spangs pas khyod dus byas na dmyal bar ltung bar gyur ta re zhes smras la /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:135b-0: 'di skad du de bzhin gshegs pa @135b thams cad kyi byin gyis rlobs la /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:135b-1: rdo rje sems dpa' bdag la 'bab par gyur cig ces smros shig par bsgo'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:135b-2: de nas rdo rje slob dpon gyis myur du sems dpa' rdo rje ma'i phyag rgya bcings la 'di skad du brjod du gzhug go /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:135b-3: 'di ni rdo rje dam tshig ste //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:135b-4: rdo rje sems dpa' yin par grags //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:135b-5: rdo rje ye shes bla med ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:135b-6: de ring nyid du 'bab par shog /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:135b-7: aom badzra a'a pe sha aa:/
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:135b-8: de nas khro bo'i phyag rgya bcings la /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:135b-9: sems dpa' rdo rje ma'i phyag rgya mdud cing drangs la /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:135b-10: theg pa chen po mngon par rtogs pa'i rdo rje'i tshig ci dga' bar brjod du gzhug go //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:135b-11: de nas babs te babs ma thag tu lha'i ye shes skye bar 'gyur te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:135b-12: ye shes des pha rol gyi sems shes par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:135b-14: ma 'ongs pa dang; da ltar byung ba rnams kyi dgos pa thams cad shes par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:135b-15: de bzhin gshegs pa'i bstan pa thams cad la 'di'i sems brtan par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:135b-16: de'i sdug bsngal thams cad zad par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:135b-17: 'jigs pa thams cad dang bral nas gnod pa med par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:135b-19: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis kyang byin gyis brlabs par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:135b-20: dngos grub thams cad ni 'di'i mngon sum du 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:135b-21: rgyu med par sngon ma byung ba'i dga' ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:136a-1: pa'i bde ba thams cad 'di la skye bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:136a-2: bde ba de dag kha cig gis ni ting nge 'dzin 'grub par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:136a-4: kha cig gis ni re ba thams cad yongs su rdzogs pa nas /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:136a-5: kha cig gis ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad 'grub ba'i bar du 'ang 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:136a-6: de nas phyag rgya de bcings la rang gi snying khar dgrol zhing snying po 'di'ang brjod du gzhug go //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:136a-7: tishtha badzra dri dho me bha ba /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:136a-8: sh'a shva to me bha ba hri da ya me /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:136a-10: sarba siddhi mme pra yatstsha h'um/
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:136a-12: de nas ma tog gi phreng ba de dkyil 'khor chen por dor zhing snying po 'di ched du brjod du gzhug go /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:136a-14: de nas gang la bab pa de 'dis 'grub bo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:136a-15: de nas phreng ba 'di blangs te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:136a-16: snying po 'dis de nyid kyi mgo bor bcings la 'di brjod du gzhug go /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:136a-17: a'om pra ti grihna sva mi m'am satva ma h'a ba la /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:136a-18: de bcings pas sems dpa' chen po des bdag gir byas par gyur pas 'di myur du 'grub par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:136a-19: de nas de ltar babs bzhin du gdong g-yogs bkrol te snying po 'di 'ang brjod du gzhug go; aom badzra sa tva sa yante tya tsakshu ra ga ta na tad pa ra au ta gha ta /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:136a-20: ya ti sarbb'a ksho badzra tsakshu aa nutta ram he badzra p'a shya /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:136a-21: de nas dkyil 'khor chen po rim bzhin du bstan to //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:136b-0: @136b dkyil 'khor chen po mthong ma thag tu 'ang de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis byin gyis brlabs par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:136b-1: rdo rje sems dpa' yang 'di'i snying ga na gnas so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:136b-2: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis byin gyis brlabs pa'i phyir 'od zer sna tshogs pa la sogs pa'i dkyil 'khor mthong ba la sogs pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:136b-4: cho 'phrul rnams kyang mthong bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:136b-5: gal te na bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin pa chen po nyid dam de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku zhig ston par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:136b-6: de phyin chad don thams cad dang yid kyi 'dod pa'i dgos pa thams cad dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:136b-7: dngos grub thams cad nas rdo rje 'dzin pa nyid dam /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:136b-8: de bzhin gshegs pa nyid du 'grub par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:136b-9: de nas dkyil 'khor chen po mthong ba'i 'og tu rdo rjes byin gyis brlabs pa'i bum pa'i nang gi dri'i chu dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:136b-10: snying po 'dis dbang bskur bar bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:136b-11: aom badzra aa bhi shinytsa m'i /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:136b-13: phreng ba gang yang rung ba zhig bcings lo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:136b-14: rang gi mtshan ma lag par bzhag la 'di skad du brjod par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:136b-15: sangs rgyas rnams kyis rdo rje'i dbang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:136b-16: de ring khyod la bskur bar bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:136b-17: sangs rgyas kun gyis rab grub phyir //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:136b-18: rdo rje 'di ni khyod kyis longs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:136b-19: aom badzra aa dhi pa ti stvam aa bhi shinytsa m'i /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:136b-20: tishtha badzra sa ma ya stvam//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:137a-0: de nas snying po 'di rdo rje ming gi dbang gis dbang @137a *//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:137a-2: aom badzra satva tvam aa bhi shinyts'a mi /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:137a-3: badzra n'a ma aa bhi she ka ta /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:137a-4: kyee; rdo rje zhes gang gi ming gang brjod pa der kye zhes brjod par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:137a-5: dkyil 'khor thams cad du 'jug pa'i cho ga rgyas pa'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:137a-6: de nas ci khyod don 'byung ba'i dngos grub kyi ye shes dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:137a-7: rdzu 'phrul gyi dngos grub 'grub pa'i ye shes dang rig 'dzin gyi dngos grub 'grub pa'i ye shes nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dngos grub kyi mchog 'grub pa'i ye shes kyi bar du gang 'dod ces smras la /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:137a-8: de nas gang gis gang 'dod pa de de la brjod par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:137a-9: de nas don thams cad kyi dngos grub 'grub pa'i phyag rgya'i ye shes bslab par bya ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:137a-10: rdo rje'i dbyings ni gter gnas pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:137a-11: snying gar yongs su bsgom par bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:137a-12: bsgoms nas sa la gnas pa yi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:137a-13: gter ni de yis mthong bar 'gyur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:137a-14: rdo rje'i dbyibs shig bris nas kyang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:137a-15: nam mkha'i ngos su bsgom par bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:137a-16: gang du ltung ba mthong ba der //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:137a-17: gter yod par ni rnam par bshad //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:137a-18: blo ldan mi yis rdo rje'i dbyibs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:137a-19: lce yi steng du bsgoms nas ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:137a-20: 'di ni yod ces bdag nyid kyis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:137a-21: bden pa nyid kyis smra bar 'gyur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:137a-22: bdag gi lus ni thams cad la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:137a-23: rdo rje'i dbyibs su bsgoms nas ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:137b-0: babs par gyur nas gar gnas @137b pa; ;gter ni de na yod par bshad //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:137b-1: de dag gi snying po ni 'di dag yin no //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:137b-6: de nas rdo rje rdzu 'phrul gyi dngos grub 'grub pa'i phyag rgya'i ye shes bslab par bya ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:137b-7: rdo rje dbab pa byas nas ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:137b-8: chu la rdo rje'i dbyibs 'dra bar //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:137b-9: bsgoms nas chu yi steng na phar //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:137b-10: 'gro ba'i dngos grub myur du thob //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:137b-11: de ltar dbab pa byas nas kyang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:137b-12: gang gi gzugs su bdag gi lus //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:137b-13: bsgoms par gyur na bdag nyid ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:137b-14: sangs rgyas kyi ni skur yang 'gyur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:137b-15: de ltar bdag la phab nas kyang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:137b-16: bdag nyid kyis ni nam mkhar ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:137b-17: bsgoms par 'gyur na ji srid du //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:137b-19: rdo rje dbab bar bdag 'gyur nas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:137b-20: rdo rje yin par bdag bsgoms na //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:137b-21: gnas nas ji srid lding 'dod pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:137b-23: de dag gi snying po ni 'di dag yin no //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:137b-28: de nas rdo rje rig 'dzin gyi dngos grub 'grub par phyag rgya'i ye shes bslab par bya ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:137b-29: zla ba'i dbyibs gcig bris nas ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:137b-30: steng gi mkha' la 'phags byas te //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:137b-31: lag par rdo rje bsgoms nas ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:137b-33: zla ba'i dbyibs steng 'dug gnas ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:137b-34: rdo rje rin chen rab bsgoms na //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:137b-35: bdag nyid dag pa ji srid 'dod //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:138a-2: zla ba'i dbyibs kyi steng 'dug nas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:138a-3: rdo rje padmo lag gnas par //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:138a-4: bsgoms nas rdo rje'i spyan gyis ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:138a-6: zla ba'i dkyil 'khor dbus gnas nas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:138a-7: las kyi rdo rje bsgom nas ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:138a-8: rdo rje sna tshogs 'dzin pa las //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:138a-10: de dag gi snying po 'di dag yin no //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:138a-15: de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dngos grub dam pa 'grub pa'i phyag rgya'i ye shes bslab par bya ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:138a-16: rdo rje kun gyi ting nge 'dzin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:138a-17: nam mkha'i dbyibs su bsams nas ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:138a-18: rdo rje'i bdag nyid ji srid 'dod //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:138a-19: de srid bar du lding bar 'gyur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:138a-20: kun la dag pa'i ting nge 'dzin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:138a-21: bsgoms na bla med de bzhin du //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:138a-22: ye shes bsgrubs pas myur du ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:138a-23: mngon shes lnga ni thob par 'gyur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:138a-24: rdo rje sems dpa' 'dra bar ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:138a-25: nam mkha' thams cad dran byas na //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:138a-26: bdag nyid dran pa brtan ldan zhing //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:138a-28: nam mkha'i dbyings ni thams cad du //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:138a-29: sangs rgyas gzugs su bsams nas ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:138a-30: sangs rgyas kun gyi ting 'dzin las //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:138a-32: de dag gi snying po ni 'di dag yin no //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:138b-2: thams cad kyi dngos grub kyi ye shes 'grub pa rnams so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:138b-3: de nas gsang ba thub pa yin pas de la dang por mna'i snying po brjod par bya ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:138b-5: hram da ye sa ma bsti ta ni b'i dy'a ta taksha n'am/
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:138b-6: y'a y'a da ya ti bru yad ai dam na yam/
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:138b-9: khyod kyis mna'i snying po 'di las 'da' bar ma byed cig /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:138b-10: khyod kyis gnod pa ma spangs pas dus ma yin par 'chi bar gyur ta re /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:138b-11: lus 'di nyid kyis dmyal bar gyur ta re zhes bsgo bar bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:138b-12: de nas gsang ba'i phyag rgya'i ye shes bslab par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:138b-13: rdo rje dbab par bskyed nas ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:138b-14: mnyam par gzhag pas rdo rje yi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:138b-15: thal mo'i ngos kyis dal brdabs na //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:138b-16: ri bo yang ni dbang du 'gyur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:138b-17: rdo rje thal mo'i phyag rgya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:138b-18: rdo rje dbab pa'i cho ga yis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:138b-19: rdo rje bsdams pa'i ngos gnyis ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:138b-20: dal gyi brdab par sbyor ba yis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:138b-21: ri bo yang ni kun nas 'gugs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:138b-22: de bzhin dbab pa'i cho ga yis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:138b-23: rdo rje bsdams pa brkyang nas ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:138b-24: sor mo'i rtse mo mnyam brdabs na //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:138b-25: rigs brgya yud kyis brlag par 'gyur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:138b-26: phra mo dbab pa'i cho ga byas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:138b-27: sor mo thams cad mnyam gzhag cing //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:138b-28: rdo rje bsdams pa bkrol ba ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:138b-29: gnod pa kun las bsal ba'i mchog /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:138b-30: des na de dag gi gsang ba sgrub pa yin te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:138b-31: bud med dam ni skyes pa yi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:139a-2: yid kyis de ltar zhugs nas kyang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:139a-3: de yi lus kun khyab par bsam //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:139a-4: de la rdo rje thal mo'i snying po ni 'di dag yin no; ;badzra b'a sha /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:139a-8: de nas snying po byin la rang gi rigs kyi lha'i phyag rgya bzhi'i ye shes bslab par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:139a-9: cho ga 'di skad du bsgo bar bya ste; khyod kyis phyag rgya la mi mkhas pa gzhan su'ang rung ba la phyag rgya gang yang rung ba bstan par ma byed cig /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:139a-11: de ni 'di ltar dkyil 'khor chen po ma mthong bar gyur pa'i sems can de dag gis phyag rgya bcing ba byas na de'i tshe de dag de ltar 'grub par mi 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:139a-12: de nas de dag the tshom du gyur te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:139a-13: gnod pa ma spangs pas myur ba nyid du dus byas nas dmyal ba chen po mnar med pa zhes bya bar ltung bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:139a-14: khyod nyid kyang ngan song du lhung bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:139a-15: de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sems dpa' sgrub pa'i phyag rgya chen po'i ye shes gang yin pa de bshad do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:139a-16: sems rtogs pa nas brtsams nas ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:139a-17: rdo rje dbyings zhes brjod byed cing //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:139a-18: sangs rgyas gzugs su bdag bsgyur la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:139a-19: rdo rje nyi ma bsgoms par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:139a-20: grub ma thag tu 'di yis ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:139a-21: ye shes tshe stobs na tshod dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:139b-1: sangs rgyas 'grub pa'ang dka' ba min //

K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:139b-4: sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje yis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:139b-5: rdo rje bsgyings par sems bskyed do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:139b-6: bsgyings bcas rdo rje gsor byed na //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:139b-7: rdo rje sems dpar bdag nyid 'gyur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:139b-9: 'dod pa kun bdag bde chen dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:139b-10: rdzu 'phrul tshe stobs gzugs mchog rnams //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:139b-12: sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje yis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:139b-13: ji ltar ri mo'i rjes mthun zhing //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:139b-14: mtshan ma'i phyag rgya rnam ldan par //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:139b-15: sems dpa' chen por bsgrub par bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:139b-16: de nas 'dir ni rtog kun gyi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:139b-17: sgrub pa dang ni dngos grub dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:139b-18: grub pa rnams kyi las chen rnams //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:139b-19: go rims bzhin du bshad par bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:139b-20: dang po nyin re dus bzhin du //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:139b-21: rang la byin gyis brlab la sogs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:139b-22: byas nas thams cad bsgrub bya ste //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:139b-23: de yi 'og tu ci dgar bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:139b-24: de la phyag rgya chen por sgrub pa'i cho ga rgyas pa ni 'di yin te //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:139b-25: rdo rje dbab pa byas nas ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:139b-26: phyag rgya chen po cho ga bzhin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:139b-27: bcings nas de yi mdun phyogs su //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:139b-28: sems dpa' chen po de bsgom mo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:139b-29: ye shes sems dpa' de mthong nas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:139b-30: rang gi lus su bsgom par bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:140a-1: ba dang; ;dbang du byas te bsgrub par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:140a-2: de la de dag gi snying po ni 'di dag yin no //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:140a-4: rdo rje dbab pa'i snying po'o //

K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:140a-17: phyag rgya thams cad sgrub pa'o //

K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:140a-24: sangs rgyas rjes su dran grub na; ;sangs rgyas nyid du myur du 'gyur //

K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:140a-27: rin chen rdo rje ma phyag rgyas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:140a-28: de ni rin chen kun dbang 'gyur //

K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:140b-15: rdo rje chos kyi cho ga yis //

K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:141a-6: rdo rje'i me tog sbyor byed pas //

K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:141a-8: rdo rje snang ba'i phyag rgya ches //

K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:142a-0: @142a *// las kyi rdo rje yin par bshad //

K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:153b-7: de nas de bzhin gshegs pa tshe tshad med pas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje chos kyi ye shes phra mo'i dam tshig gi dkyil 'khor byin gyis brlabs pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te rang gi rig pa'i mchog 'di smras pa /

K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:154a-1: pa gdon mi za bar grub pas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje las kyi ye shes phra mo'i dam tshig gi dkyil 'khor byin gyis brlabs pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te rang gi rig pa'i mchog 'di smras pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:154a-2: aom karma s'ukshma badzra dzny'a na sa ma ye h'um/
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:154a-3: de nas de bzhin gshegs pa bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje ye shes phra mo'i rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:154a-4: bcom ldan 'das snyoms par zhugs ma thag tu de nyid kyi tshe na de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi thugs ka nas rdo rje ye shes phra mo'i 'od zer de rnams byung nas 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad snang bar byas te; sems can thams cad la de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje'i ye shes phra mo'i ting nge 'dzin du snyoms par zhugs pa brtan par byas te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:154a-5: yang gcig tu gyur nas ting nge 'dzin gyi ye shes kyi rdo rje'i skur dmigs te gcig tu 'dus nas de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes su gyur te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:154a-6: bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyi thugs su zhugs so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:154b-0: de nas bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rje de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ye shes kyi thugs su zhugs nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ye shes @154b phra mo'i dam tshig chen po'i rdo rje 'di smras pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:154b-2: de nas de smras ma thag tu de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi thugs ka nas bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rje de nyid byung nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ye shes phra mo'i rdo rje'i dbyibs su bdag nyid byin gyis brlabs te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:154b-3: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi shangs kyi rtse mo'i phyogs su gnas nas chen du brjod pa 'di ched du brjod do //

K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:154b-7: khams gsum yang ni rgyas par byed //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:154b-8: de nas de skad ces smras pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:154b-9: bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rje de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi shangs kyi rtse mo'i phyogs na rab tu phra ba'i ye shes kyi mtshan ma rgyas par bya ba'i sbyor bas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku la khyab par byas nas chos kyi dbyings thams cad khyab par bya ba'i tshul gyis nam mkha'i dbyings thams cad du rab tu phra ba'i rdo rje ye shes kyi mtshan ma rnams kyi khyab par byas so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:154b-10: nam mkha'i dbyings thams cad khyab par byas nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ye shes kyi rdo rje'i dbyibs su bdag nyid byin gyis brlabs te 'dug go /

K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:155a-1: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ye shes kyi rdo rje'i dbus su rdo rje'i chos nyid du dmigs nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje'i ye shes phra mo'i byin gyis brlabs pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te bzhugs so //

K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:158a-26: las rnams thams cad des bsgrub bo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:158a-27: de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ye shes kyi rdo rje'i byin gyis brlabs pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gyi phyag rgya'i ye shes la bslab bo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:158a-28: rdo rje phra mo'i tshul gyis ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:158b-0: @158b rdo rje'i dbus su bsgom bya ba //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:158b-1: bdag nyid sangs rgyas sku nyid du //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:158b-2: des ni sangs rgyas nyid du 'grub //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:158b-3: de nas rdo rje sems dpa' la sogs ba'i ting nge 'dzin gyi phyag rgya'i ye shes la bslab bo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:158b-4: rdo rje phra mo'i tshul sbyar la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:158b-5: snying gar rdo rje la sogs 'khod //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:158b-6: bsgoms nas rdo rje la sogs pas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:158b-7: rang gi dngos grub sbyin par byed //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:158b-8: de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rigs kyi ting nge 'dzin gyi dam tshig gi phyag rgya'i ye shes la bslab bo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:158b-9: rdo rje bcings las legs byung bar //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:158b-10: bcu drug rnams su bshad pa ste; ;ting nge 'dzin ni dam tshig mchog /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:158b-11: de rnams kyis ni bcings pa bshad //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:158b-12: dkyil mo krung 'dug gan rkyal du //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:158b-13: g-yas gcus de bzhin slar gcus pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:158b-14: snying gar gnas pa bzhi pa ste //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:158b-15: rdo rje sems sogs dkyil 'khor ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:158b-16: dpral bar gzhag dang ltag pa dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:158b-17: phrag pa dang ni dgod par sbyar //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:158b-18: khar bzhag snying gar ral gri dang; ;snying gar rgyas dang kha nas dbyung //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:158b-19: sbyi bo thong ka khar bzhag pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:158b-20: mdzub mo gnyis bkug mdun de bzhin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:158b-21: de nas gzhan yang chos kyi phyag rgya la bslab par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:158b-22: takki; gra gra; ma ta; aa gra: tr'am tr'am; aam aam; bam bam; tri ta; hr'i:ta /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:158b-27: de nas chos kyi las kyi mchog /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:159a-2: ye shes khu tshur dam tshig las //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:159a-3: gnyis su byas nas sbyar bar bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:159a-4: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi theg pa chen po mngon par rtogs pa chen po'i rgyal po rdo rje ye shes kyi chos kyi dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga rgyas pa rdzogs so ////
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:159a-5: de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi mchog gi bla na med pa'i mchod pa chen po'i cho ga rgyas pas khyab pa'i las kyi dam tshig gi ye shes byin gyis brlabs pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:159a-6: rang gi rig pa'i mchog 'di smras pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:159a-7: aom sarbba ta th'a ga ta badzra dh'a tu aa nutta ra p'u dza karma spha ra na sa ma ye h'um/
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:159a-8: de nas de bzhin gshegs pa mi g-yo bas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje sems dpa'i mchod pa bla na med pa'i cho ga rgyas pas khyab pa'i las kyi dam tshig gi rdo rje'i byin gyis brlabs pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:159a-9: rang gi rig pa'i mchog 'di smras pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:159a-10: aom sarba ta th'a ga ta badzra satva aa nutta ra p'u dz'a karmma spha ra na sa ma ye h'um/
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:159b-0: de nas de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen 'byung bas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad rdo rje rin po che'i mchod pa bla na med pa'i cho ga rgyas pas khyab @159b pa'i las kyi dam tshig gi rdo rje'i byin gyis brlabs pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:159b-1: rang gi rig pa'i mchog 'di smras pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:159b-2: aom sarbba ta th'a ga ta badzra ratna aa nutta ra p'u dza karmma spha [?] ra na sa ma ye h'um/
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:159b-3: de nas de bzhin gshegs pa tshe tshad med pas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad rdo rje chos kyi mchod pa bla na med pa'i cho ga rgyas pas khyab pa'i [?] las gyi dam tshig gi rdo rje'i byin gyis brlabs pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:159b-4: rang gi rig pa'i mchog 'di smras pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:159b-5: aom sarbba ta th'a ga ta badzra dharmma aa nutta ra p'u dz'a karmma spha ra na sa ma ye h'um/
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:159b-6: de nas de bzhin gshegs pa gdon mi za bar grub pas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje las kyi mchod pa bla na med pa'i cho ga rgyas pas khyab pa'i las kyi dam tshig gi rdo rje'i byin gyis brlabs pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas rang gi rig pa'i mchog 'di smras pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:159b-7: aom sarbba ta th'a ga ta badzra karmma aa nutta ra p'u dz'a karmma spha ra na ma ye h'um/
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:159b-8: de nas yang bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi mchod pa'i cho ga rgyas pas chos kyi dbyings thams cad du khyab pa'i las kyi dam tshig gi rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:160a-1: par zhugs ma thag tu de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi thugs las bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rje de nyid de /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:160a-2: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi mchod pa'i cho ga rgyas pas chos kyi dbyings thams cad du khyab pa'i nam mkha'i dbyings kun tu rgyas pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:160a-3: rnam pa sna tshogs pa'i mchod pa thams cad kyi bkod pa'i cho ga rgyas pa'i rab 'byams sprin gyi rgya mtsho'i lha mo rnams su gyur te byung nas /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:160a-4: 'jig rten gyi khams rab 'byams sprin gyi rgya mtsho rnams su de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor du de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad bla na med pa'i byang chub kyi sems chen po bskyed pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:160a-5: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rigs mnyes par bya ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:160a-6: kun tu bzang po'i sbyod pa bsgrub pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:160a-7: byang chub chen po'i snying por nye bar 'gro ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:160a-9: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi mnyam pa nyid mngon par rdzogs par byang chub par bya ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:160a-10: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dkyil 'khor chen po bskyed pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:160a-11: khams gsum thams cad las rnam par rgyal bar bya ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:160a-12: dam pa'i chos kyi 'khor lo bskor bar bya ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:160b-0: sems can gyi khams ma lus shing lus pa med @160b pa rnams kyi don bya ba la sogs pa sangs rgyas kyi rdzu 'phrul dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:160b-1: cho 'phrul thams cad bstan nas bzhugs so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:160b-2: mchod pa'i sprin rgya mtsho'i lha mo de dag kyang rang rang gi phyag rgya lag pa gnyis kyis 'dzin cing de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la cho ga bzhin du yang dag par mchod de /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:160b-3: rdo rje dbyings kyi dkyil 'khor chen po'i tshul du zla pa'i dkyil 'khor la gnas nas ched du brjod pa 'di ched du brjod do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:160b-4: ae ma'o sangs rgyas mchod pa bdag /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:160b-5: mchod pa kun ni byed pa yi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:160b-6: gang phyir sangs rgyas byin can du //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:160b-7: sangs rgyas kun gyis grub par mdzad //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:160b-8: de nas yang phyag na rdo rjes de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis mchod pa la sogs pa'i las kyi cho ga rgyas pa rdo rje'i bya ba zhes bya ba'i las kyi dkyil 'khor 'di bshad do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:160b-9: aom sarbba ta th'a ga ta sarbba a'atm'a ni ry'a ta na p'u spha ra na karmma badzri ni h'um y'a /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:160b-10: aom sarbba ta th'a ga ta sarbba a'atm'a ni ry'a ta na p'u dz'a spha ra na karmma gri dza;/
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:160b-11: aom sarbba ta th'a ga ta sarbba a'atma ni ry'a ta na aa nu r'a ga p'u dz'a spha ra na karmma b'a ne h'um ho /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:160b-12: aom sarbba ta th'a ga ta sarbba a'atm'a ni ry'a ta na sa dhu g'a ra p'u dz'a spha ra na karmma tushti aa: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rab tu dga' zhing bad [?] ma dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:160b-13: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad spyan 'dren ma dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:161a-1: thams cad mnyes par byed pa mo dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:161a-2: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dgyes par byed pa mo rnams ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi mchod pa chen po rnams so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:161a-3: aom na ma: sarba ta th'a ga ta k'a ya aa bhi she ka ratne bhyo badzra ma ni aom/
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:161a-4: aom na ma: sarbba ta th'a ga ta s'u rye bho badzra te dzo ni dzv'a la hr'i: aom na ma: sarbba ta th'a ga ta sha pa pa ri p'u ra ni /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:161a-5: tsinta ma ni dhva dza aa gre bhyo badzra dhva dza aa gri tr'am/
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:161a-6: aom na ma: sarba ta th'a ga ta mah'a pr'i ti pra mo dya ka re bhyo badzra h'a sye ta /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:161a-9: rin po che chen po'i char 'bebs ma dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:161a-10: rab tu dga' zhing mgu ba ma rnams ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dbang bskur ba'i mchod pa'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:161a-11: aom sarbba ta th'a ga ta badzra dharma t'a sa m'a dhi bhi stu no mi mah'a dharm'a gri hr'i: aom sarbba ta th'a ga ta pradzny'a p'a ra mi t'a nir ha ree: stu no mi mah'a g'o sh'a nu ge dham/
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:161a-12: aom sarbba ta th'a ga ta tsakra aaksha ram pa ri brtt'a di sarba su tr'atanan yee stu no mi sarba mandal h'um/
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:161a-13: aom sarbba ta th'a ga ta sandhi bh'a sha buddha sam g'i ti bhirga yam/
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:161a-14: stu no mi badzra b'a tse bam/
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:161a-15: ye shes chen mo'i glu ma dan /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:161a-16: dbyangs chen mo'i rjes su 'brang ma dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:161a-17: dkyil 'khor thams cad du 'jug ma dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:161b-0: sngags kyi spyod pa mo rnams ni de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi chos kyi mchod @161b pa'o; ;aom sarba ta th'a ga ta dhu pa me gha snga ra na p'u dz'a karme ka ra ka ra /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:161b-1: aom sarba ta th'a ga ta pushpa pra sa ra spha ra na p'u dz'a karme ki ri ki ri /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:161b-2: aom sarba ta th'a ga ta a'a lo ke dzva la spha ra na p'u dz'a karme bha ra bha ra /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:161b-3: aom sarba ta th'a ga ta gandha sa mu dra spha ra na p'u dz'a karme ku ru ku ru /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:161b-5: byang chub chen mo'i yan lag ldan ma dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:161b-7: dri ldan ma rnams ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi las kyi mchod pa'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:161b-8: de nas 'dir de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad ma lus shing lus pa med pa thams cad la mchod pa byed pa'i las kyi dkyil 'khor rdo rje zhes bya ba bshad do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:161b-9: de nas rab tu bshad bya ba //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:161b-10: las kyi dkyil 'khor dam pa ste //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:161b-11: rdo rje dbyings dang 'dra bas na //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:161b-12: rdo rje bya ba zhes kyang grags //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:161b-13: dkyil 'khor chen po'i tshul du ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:161b-14: sangs rgyas sku rnams gzhag par bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:161b-15: rdo rje sems sogs tshul du ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:161b-16: lha mo phyag rgya bcas pa bri //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:161b-17: de nas las kyi dkyil 'khor rdo rje bya ba 'dir gzhug pa la sogs pa'i cho ga rgyas pa 'di bshad do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:161b-18: de la dbang por rdo rje dbyings kyi dkyil 'khor du 'jug pa'i tshul gyis gzhug par bya ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:161b-20: 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi mchod pa'i dam tshig yin gyi /

K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:162a-2: de nas gdong g-yogs bkrol te las kyi dkyil 'khor bstan la thams cad kyi mtshan ma lag pa gnyis su sbyin no //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:162a-3: de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis kyang mchod na gzhan gyis lta smos kyang ci dgos //

K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:162b-0: @162b buddha p'u dz'a ka ro ni /

K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:162b-7: rjes su yi rang bas mchod na //

K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:162b-10: lha rdzas kyi ni bdag dbul ba'i //

K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:162b-20: chos rnams rang bzhin 'od gsal ba //

K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:162b-23: dga' ba'i bde ba thob par 'gyur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:162b-24: chos rnams kun ni 'dus pa yi //

K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:166b-2: dam tshig mchog gi dam tshig go /

K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:166b-12: rdo rje'i dngos grub kyi phyag rgya bzhi pa'i dkyil 'khor ji lta ba bzhin du mi g-yo ba'i dkyil 'khor la sogs pa dkyil 'khor thams cad phyag rgya bzhi ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi tshul du rang rang gi phyag rgya rnams su bris na dngos grub thams cad kyang 'grub bo //
