K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:295a-19: mkhas pas dgos pa gang bsam pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:295a-21: zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje snying pos gsungs so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:295a-22: rigs thams cad kyi las kyi dgos pa'i dngos grub kyi cho ga rgyas pa'i rgyud de /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:295b-0: de nas bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rjes de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi phyag rgya sgom pa'i dngos grub kyi rgyud 'di gsungs @295b so; ;de la 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i byin gyis brlabs kyi rnal 'byor gyi dngos grub kyi rgyud de /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:295b-2: rdo rje phra mo'i tshul gyis ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:295b-3: sangs rgyas phyag rgya rab bsgrubs pas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:295b-5: zhes bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa phyag na rdo rjes gsungs so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:295b-6: de la 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs kyi sems dpa'i byin gyis brlabs kyis rnal 'byor gyi dngos grub kyi rgyud de /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:295b-7: kun gyi bdag nyid sems dpa' ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:295b-8: bdag gi lus la gnas pa ste //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:295b-9: sems dpa' bdag ces byin brlabs la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:295b-10: bdag ces bya ba'i nga rgyal gyis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:295b-12: bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi theg pa chen po mngon par 'dus pa'i rdo rje sems dpas gsungs so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:295b-13: de la 'di ni rdo rje'i rigs kyi rdo rje'i byin gyi brlabs pa'i rnal 'byor gyi rgyud de /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:295b-14: sems dpa' ji bzhin phyag rgya bzhin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:295b-15: phyag rgya ji bzhin bdag de bzhin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:295b-16: cho ga 'di yi tshul gyis ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:295b-17: phyag rgya thams cad bsgrub par bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:295b-18: zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin pas gsungs so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:295b-19: de la 'di ni padma'i rigs kyi chos kyi byin gyis brlabs pa'i rnal 'byor gyi rgyud de /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:295b-20: chos kyi phyag rgya'i tshul gyis ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:295b-21: rdo rje phra mo bsgoms byas la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:295b-22: ngag gi phyag rgyas de dag kun //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:296a-2: ces bcom ldan 'das 'phags pa kun tu spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang pos gsungs so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:296a-3: de la 'di ni nor bu'i rigs kyi las kyi byin gyis brlabs pa'i rnal 'byor gyi rgyud de /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:296a-4: sangs rgyas kun la dbang bskur dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:296a-5: mchod dang dam tshig dngos grub rnams //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:296a-6: bcom ldan 'das zhes bsgoms nas kyang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:296a-7: rdo rje las rnams bsgrub par bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:296a-8: zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje las kyis gsungs so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:296a-9: rigs thams cad kyi phyag rgya sgom pa'i dngos grub kyi rgyud do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:296a-10: de nas yang bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad gcig tu 'dus nas bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi 'khor los bsgyur ba phyag na rdo rje la legs so zhes bya bi byin no //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:296a-11: rdo rje theg pa bla na med //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:296a-12: de bzhin gshegs pa kun gyi gsang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:296a-13: theg pa chen po mngon 'dus pa'i //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:296a-14: mdo 'di legs par bshad pas na //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:296a-15: rdo rje sems dpa' khyod legs so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:296a-16: rdo rje rin chen khyod legs so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:296a-17: rdo rje chos ni khyod legs so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:296a-18: rdo rje las ni khyod legs so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:296a-19: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi de kho na nyid bsdus pa las brtag pa thams cad kyi gsang ba'i rgyud phyi ma'i cho ga rgyas pa rdzogs so ////
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:296b-0: de bzhin @296b gshegs pa thams cad kyi de kho na nyid bsdus pa ////
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:296b-2: de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rjes tshigs su bcad pa 'di gsungs so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:296b-3: lta ba ngan cing chags bral la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:296b-4: gsang ba 'di ni mi rigs te //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:296b-5: sems can kun la phan don du //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:296b-6: de bzhin cho ga bshad par bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:296b-7: de nas yang byang chub sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rjes de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rigs kyi yo byad dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:296b-8: cho ga rgyas pa'i rgyud 'di gsungs so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:296b-9: de la 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rigs kyi yo byad dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:296b-10: cho ga rgyas pa'i rgyud de /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:296b-11: de la 'di ni snying po'i yo byad dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:296b-12: cho ga rgyas pa'i rgyud yin te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:296b-14: bdug pa dang; mar me dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:296b-16: dri'i phyag rgya rnams kyis mchod pa byas te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:296b-17: de nas rdo rje tshig gis bzlas pa brtsam par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:296b-18: de la 'di ni bzlas pa'i cho ga rgyas pa'i rgyud de /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:296b-19: zla ba bzhir gnas ji bzhin par 'dug ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:296b-20: dus bzhir bdug pa la sogs pas cho ga bzhin du mchod nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi theg pa chen po mngon par rtogs pa'i mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad pas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la bstod de //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:297a-0: phyag rgya bzhis phyag bya ba'i tshul gyis phyag byas la sngags 'di bzhis @297a *//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:297a-1: bdag gi lus dbul zhing mchod pa bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:297a-2: aom sarba ta th'a ga ta p'u dzo ba stha n'a ya /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:297a-3: a'atm'a nam niry'a ta y'a mi /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:297a-4: sarba ta th'a ga ta badzra satva aa dhi tishtha sva m'am/
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:297a-5: aom sarba tath'a ga ta p'u dz'a aa bhi she k'a ya a'atm'a nam ni ry'a ta y'a mi /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:297a-6: sarba ta th'a ga ta badzra ratna aa bhi shinytsa m'am/
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:297a-7: aom sarba ta th'a ga ta p'u dz'a pra brta n'a ya a'atma nam ni ry'a ta y'a mi /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:297a-8: sarba ta th'a ga ta badzra dharma pra brta ya m'am/
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:297a-9: aom sarba ta th'a ga ta p'u dz'a karma ni a'atm'a nam ni ry'a ta ya mi /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:297a-10: sarba ta th'a ga ta badzra karma ku ru m'am/
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:297a-11: de nas 'dod pa'i yon tan thams cad la chags pa dang ma bral la kha zas kun dang 'dod pa kun la nye bar spyod cing bdag nyid snying po'i don du sangs rgyas kyi gzugs brnyan mdun du tshig tsam gyis kyang bsgoms la ci dga' bar byed cing rdo rje tshig gis lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas na myur bar dngos grub tu 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:297a-12: zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpas gsungs so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:297a-13: ci ste bla na med pa'i dngos grub 'dod na ni de nas ras la bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa ni dbus na bzhugs /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:297a-14: de'i sems dpa' chen po bzhi dkyil 'khor gyi tshul du kha dog dang; rgyan rnams ci dga' bar bya ste bri zhing /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:297a-15: sems dpa' chen po rnams zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la bzhugs la rigs kyi lha mo rnams grva rnams su gri'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:297b-0: de @297b nas ri mo'i sku gzugs la mchod pa rgya cher byas la 'dzab bya ba'i tshul ji lta ba bzhin du zla ba bzhi'i bar du bzlas par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:297b-1: de nas mthar mchod pa rgya cher byas la mtshan thog thag bzlas par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:297b-2: de nas nam langs pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:297b-3: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi de kho na nyid la sogs pa'i dngos grub dam pa thob par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:297b-4: zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin pas gsungs so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:297b-5: yang na phyag rgya bsgrub par 'dod na ni des de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sems dpa' rdo rje ma'i phyag rgya bcings la ri mo'i sku gzugs kyi phyag rgya'i spyan sngar ci dga' ba bzhin du ji lta ba bzhin bcings shing dkrol te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:297b-6: rdo rje'i tshig 'bum bzlas par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:297b-7: de nas mthar mtshan thog thag ngal mi gso bar cung zad tsam zhig phyag rgya bkrol te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:297b-8: ji lta ba bzhin bcings nas bzlas brjod bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:297b-9: de nas phyag rgya 'bar zhing 'bab la 'phar zhing nyung bar smra bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:297b-10: de nas phyag rgya bcings bzhin du nam mkha' la lding bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:297b-13: las thams cad kyang byed par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:297b-14: bcings ma thag tu phyag rgya thams cad kyis kyang las thams cad ji lta ba bzhin byed par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:297b-15: zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin pas gsungs so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:298a-0: yang na ting nge 'dzin bsgrub par 'dod na ni des rdo rje phra mo nas brtsams @298a *//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:298a-1: te; ting nge 'dzin de gang la dga' ba'i snying po'i rnal 'byor gyi tshul du zla ba bzhi'i bar du bsgoms la /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:298a-2: de nas mthar mtshan thog thag skyil mi krung /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:298a-3: mi zhig par snyoms par zhugs te 'dug par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:298a-4: de nas nam langs pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:298a-5: de bzhin gshegs pas la sogs pa'i dngos grub thams cad mngon sum du 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:298a-6: de nas ji lta bu 'dod pa de lta bu thob par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:298a-7: zhes bcom ldan rdo rje sems dpas gsungs so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:298a-8: ci ste las sgrub par 'dod na'ang de bzhin du bzlas shing zla ba gcig gi bar du bsgrubs la /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:298a-9: de nas mthar mtshan gcig thog thag tu bzlas par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:298a-10: de nas las thams cad kyi dngos grub tu 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:298a-11: zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin pas gsungs so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:298a-12: ci ste las shig bya bar 'dod na yang lan gcig brjod pa tsam gyis bdag dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:298a-15: grong khyer rnams go cha bcing ba la sogs pas bsrungs par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:298a-16: dbab pa'ang bya ste tsandan dri zhim pos gdon gyis zin pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:298a-17: gdon gyi ma zin pa rnams rdo rje dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:298b-3: phyag rgyal sogs pa dngos po thams cad gcig brjod pas 'bebs par byed do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:298b-4: sgyu ma'i las kyang byed de /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:298b-5: rma bya'i mjug sgro'i nang du rdo rje bcug ste bcings la /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:298b-6: de nas rma bya'i mjug sgro de sems dpa' rdo rje ma'i phyag rgyas mnan la de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sems dpa' rdo rje ma'i phyag rgya babs kyi bar du bzlas par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:298b-7: de nas rma bya'i mjug sgro las gzugs sna tshogs pa la sogs par snang bar 'gyur te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:298b-8: de phyin chad rma bya'i mjug sgros rang gi lus la cho ga bzhin du gzugs thams cad kyang ston te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:298b-9: mjug sgro de nyid la lan gcig bzlas te bskor bas kyang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:298b-10: bdag nyid las gzugs thams cad snang bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:298b-11: mjug sgro de nyid kyis 'jig rten pa'i sgyu ma'i las rnams kyang ston /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:298b-13: byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi gzugs brnyan yang ston /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:298b-14: phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad na de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor dang bcas pa rnams kyis bdud sde dang bcas pa rnams 'dul ba la sogs pa rnams rdzu 'phrul gyis rnam par rol pa la sogs pa mdzad pa rnams kyang ston pa nas /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:298b-15: bdag nyid las rnam pa'i mchog thams cad dang ldan pa'i sangs rgyas kyi sku gzugs kyang ston pa'i bar du'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:299a-1: byed par 'dod na'ang de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sems dpa' rdo rje ma'i phyag rgya bcings la phyag rgya de 'bar bar gyur gyi bar du bzlas par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:299a-2: de nas de phyin chad phyag rgya bcings pa tsam gyis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad mnyes par byed cing dbang du byed na sems dpa' gzhan lta smos kyang ci dgos /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:299a-4: 'jig rten las 'das pa'i dngos bsgrub par 'dod na'ang des dang po kho nar de bzhin du zlo sa shing zla ba gcig tu brgyad stong bzlas la de nas mthar phyag rgya bcings te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:299a-5: de bzhin du mtshan thog thag phyag rgya 'bar gyi bar bzlas par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:299a-6: de phyin chad phyag rgya bcings pa tsam gyis 'jig rten gyi dngos grub dang rig 'dzin gyi dngos grub gang yang rung ba gcig tu 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:299a-7: zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin pas gsungs so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:299a-8: de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs kyi yo byad dang cho ga rgyas pa rdzogs so ////
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:299a-9: de nas rdo rje'i rigs kyi yo byad dang cho ga rgyas pa ni 'di yin te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:299a-10: de la dang por ni sngar bsnyen pa bya ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:299a-11: de ltar ci 'dod pa bzhin du yi ge 'bru 'bum bzlas par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:299a-12: de'i mthar mtshan thog thag tu bzlas ba byas la de phyin chad sems can thams cad la phan gdags pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:299b-0: chad pas @299b bcad par nus par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:299b-1: zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin pas gsungs so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:299b-3: des ji lta ba bzhin du ri mo'i sku gzugs bris la /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:299b-4: des de bzhin du mchod pa byas nas zla ba gcig tu 'dod pa kun la longs spyod cing ci dga' ba bzhin du byas nas brgya stong du bzlas bar rdus bzhir rdo rje'i tshig gis zlo sa shing zla ba'i mthar phyin pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:299b-5: ri mo'i gzugs la mchod pa rgya cher byas nas rdo rje h'um zhes bya ba'i phyag rgya bcings la phyag rgya bcings pa de las h'um zhes bya ba'i sgra byung gi bar du bzlas par bya'o; ;de nas nam langs pa dang lha rnams kyi dbang po dbang phyug chen po la sogs pa 'khor dang bcas pa rnams mdun du gnas nas bka' nod par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:299b-6: de nas rig 'dzin gyis 'di skad du bsgo bar bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:299b-7: gang gi tshe ngas khyod tshur shog 'di byos shig /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:299b-8: ces bsgo ba de'i tshe na khyod 'dir 'ongs la nga'i bka' bzhin byos shig /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:299b-9: de phyin chad 'jig rten gsum po mtha' dag gi bdag por 'gyur te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:299b-10: yud tsam gyis kyang sa gsum pa thams cad la ci dgar bka' stsol cing bskor te slar 'ongs nas kyang phan gdags pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:300a-0: chad pas bcad pa rnams byed cing lha rdzas kyi 'jig rten gsum longs spyod la nye bar spyad nas ji ltar dga' ba bzhin du byed cing lha thams cad kyi dbang po'i bud @300a *//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:300a-1: med la sogs pa bud med thams cad mgu bar byas nas /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:300a-2: nye bar spyod kyang de la su gang gis byas kyang gnod par byed nus pa med de /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:300a-3: h'um zhes bya bas lha la sogs pa ma rungs pa thams cad gnon cing de nas bskal pa chung du'i stong gi bar du 'tsho bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:300a-4: zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin pas gsungs so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:300a-5: ci ste phyag rgya bsgrub par 'dod na yang ji lta ba bzhin du bzlas pa byas la bzlas pa'i mthar rdo rje h'um zhes bya ba'i dam tshig gi phyag rgya bcings la /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:300a-6: mtshan thog thag tu bzlas par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:300a-7: de nas nam langs pa dang phyag rgya 'grub par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:300a-8: de nas h'um zhes bya ba dang ldan par ji lta ba'i cho ga bzhin du phyag rgya bcings na nam mkha' la 'gro ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:300a-11: sgyu ma rnams ston pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:300a-12: thams cad la dbab pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:300a-15: thams cad kyi dga' ba bskyed par bya ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:300a-16: rin po che thams cad bsdu ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:300a-17: 'od zer 'bar ba chen po bstan pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:300a-18: rin po che'i char 'bebs par bstan pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:300a-19: gad mo cher bgad pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:300a-20: sems can thams cad spyad pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:300a-23: dus kyi 'khor los bsgyur ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:300a-24: ji lta ba bzhin pa'i de kho na nyid brjod pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:300b-0: las @300b thams cad la 'jug pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:300b-7: sems can thams cad phyag rgya gdab pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:300b-8: 'dod pa'i dga' ba la 'jug pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:300b-10: dngos po thams cad glu len du gzhug pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:300b-11: gang byed du gzhug ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:300b-15: dbab pa la sogs pa las thams cad byed par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:300b-16: zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin pas gsungs so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:300b-17: ci ste rdo rje phra mo bsgrub par 'dod na'ang des rdo rje h'um zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin du bsgom zhing de bzhin du bzlas pa'i tshul gyis zla ba gcig tu bsgrub par bya ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:300b-18: de nas mthar ting nge 'dzin de nyid kyis mtshan gcig thog thag bzlas par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:300b-19: de nas nam langs pa dang mngon par shes pa lngar gyur nas sems can thams cad la phan gdags pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:300b-20: tshar gcad pa nus par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:300b-21: zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin pas gsungs so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:300b-22: ci ste las bsgrub par 'dod na de bzhin du zlo ba gcig tu bsgrub la de nas mthar mtshan gcig thog thag tu bzlas par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:300b-23: de nas las thams cad 'grub par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:300b-24: zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin pas gsungs so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:301a-0: de nas las rnams byed par 'dod na yang lan gcig brjod de yid kyi @301a *//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:301a-1: bsam pas bsrung ba la sogs pa las thams cad byed par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:301a-2: rdo rje'i rigs kyi yo byad dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:301a-3: cho ga rgyas pa rdzogs so ////
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:301a-4: de nas padma'i rigs kyi yo byad dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:301a-5: chog rgyas pa ni 'di yin te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:301a-6: de la dang por 'bum bzlas pa byas na bsnyen pa byas par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:301a-7: de nas bsgrub par bya ste ras la bcom ldan 'das 'gro ba thams cad 'dul ba la sogs pa bris pa de'i phyogs thams cad du dkyil 'khor bzhi'i tshul du sems dpa' chen po bzhi bris la grva rnams su lha mo rnams bri'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:301a-8: de nas bzlas pa'i cho ga de bzhin du rgyas par byas la zla ba'i mthar mtshan gcig thog thag tu bzlas par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:301a-9: de nas bcom ldan 'das 'gro ba thams cad 'dul bar byon te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:301a-10: dus ji bzhin par dam pa'i skabs 'byed par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:301a-11: zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin pas gsungs so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:301a-12: ci ste phyag rgya bsgrub par 'dod na'ang des de bzhin du padma rdo rje ma'i phyag rgya bcings la stong phrag brgyad tshang bar brjod pa'i bar du dus bzhir bzlas par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:301a-13: de nas mthar mtshan gcig thog thag tu phyag rgya bcings te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:301a-14: bzlas pa byas la nam langs pa dang dngos grub tu 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:301a-15: de nas phyag rgya bcings pas ji lta ba bzhin du 'gro ba thams cad 'dul bar byed do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:301a-16: zhes bcom ldan 'das kun tu spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang pos gsungs so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:301b-0: ci ste ting nge 'dzin @301b gyi tshul du bsgrub bar 'dod na yang de bzhin du zla ba'i mthar mtshan gcig thog thag tu ji ltar dga' ba'i ting nge 'dzin gyis bzlas pa bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:301b-1: de nas nam langs pa dang ting nge 'dzin thams cad mngon sum du 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:301b-2: zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje chos kyis gsungs so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:301b-3: ci ste las bsgrub par 'dod na'ang de bzhin du bzlas la zla ba'i mthar mtshan gcig thog thag tu bzlas par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:301b-4: de nas las thams cad nus par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:301b-5: zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin pas gsungs so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:301b-6: padma'i rigs kyi yo byad dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:301b-7: cho ga rgyas pa rdzogs so ////
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:301b-8: de nas nor bu'i rigs kyi nye bar spyod pa'i cho ga rgyas pa ni 'di yin te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:301b-9: de la dang po kho nar de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la phyag rnam bzhi byas la 'bum bzlas par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:301b-10: de nas de bzhin du ras la bcom ldan 'das don thams cad grub pa'i dkyil 'khor bzhi'i tshul du bris la /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:301b-11: de nas de bzhin du mchod pa byas te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:301b-12: de bzhin du bsgrub la zla ba'i mthar mtshan gcig thog thag tu bzlas par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:301b-13: de nas nam langs pa dang bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dbang bskur ba'i rin po che byang chub sems dpa' nam mkha'i snying po byon nas dbang bskur ba sbyin pa mdzad do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:302a-0: dbang bskur ba des stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams @302a *//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:302a-1: der rig 'dzin gyi 'khor los bsgyur bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:302a-2: zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin pas gsungs so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:302a-3: ci ste phyag rgya bsgrub par 'dod na yang de bzhin du chos kyi rdo rje ma'i tshul rdo rje rin po che'i myu gu'i phyag rgya ji lta ba bzhin du bsgrub na bsam pa thams cad kyi las byed par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:302a-4: zhas bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin pas gsungs so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:302a-5: ci ste nor bu ye shes bsgrub par 'dod na 'ang de bzhin du rin po che 'byung ba'i ting nge 'dzin rim pa bzhin tu bsgom par byas te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:302a-6: dngos po med pa'i nam mkha' las rin po che ji ltar 'byung ba rin po che las byang chub sems dpa'i sku ji ltar 'byung ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin 'di dus bzhir bsgoms la ji ltar gong du smos pa bzhin du bzlas pa bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:302a-7: de nas zla ba'i mthar ting 'dzin de nyid kyis mtshan gcig thog thag tu bzlas pa bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:302a-8: de nas nam langs pa dang de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad byon nas ci dga' ba bzhin du dbang bskur bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:302a-9: zhes bcom ldan 'das nam mkha'i snying pos gsungs so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:302a-10: de nas las sgrub pa bshad de /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:302a-11: de bzhin du bzlas la zla ba'i mthar mtshan gcig thog thag tu bzlas par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:302a-12: de nas nam langs pa dang bcom ldan 'das nam mkha'i snying pos don thams cad 'grub par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:302b-0: @302b de nas las thams cad byed par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:302b-1: zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin pas gsungs so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:302b-2: nor bu'i rigs kyi nye bar spyod pa'i cho ga rgyas pa rdzogs so ////
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:302b-3: de nas rigs thams cad kyi thun mong du bsgrub pa'i yo byad dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:302b-4: cho ga rgyas pa ni 'di yin te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:302b-5: de la dang por snying po thams cad kyi yo byad dang cho ga rgyas pa bshad do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:302b-6: snying po bsgrub par 'dod na de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi grub par gyur cig ces brjod la snying po ci dga' bar bzlas shing bsgrub pa'i cho ga bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:302b-7: de la 'di ni phyag rgya'i yo byad dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:302b-9: phyag rgya thams cad bdag la dga' bar gyur cig ces smras la dam tshig gi phyag rgya bcings te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:302b-10: ci dga' bar ci nus kyis bzlas par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:302b-11: de nas ci lta ba bzhin du dngos grub tu 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:302b-12: de la 'di ni sngags thams cad kyi yo byad dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:302b-14: spros pa med pa'i tshig grub par gyur cig /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:302b-15: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ting nge 'dzin bdag la skye bar gyur cig ces smras la sngags ci dga' bar bzlas pa byas te 'di ni dngos grub bo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:302b-16: de la 'di ni rig pa'i yo byad dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:302b-18: kye ma sems can 'di dag thams cad ni mi rag pas ldongs par gyur /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:302b-19: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad ni rig pa rtogs shing sdom par gyur to //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:303a-0: zhes smras la rig pa ci dga' bar @303a *//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:303a-1: bzlas shing bsgrub par bya'o zhes bcom ldan 'das 'phags pa rdo rje 'dzin pas gsungs so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:303a-4: phyag rgya dang rig pa thams cad ji ltar bsgom pa nyid du rdo rje bzlas pa'i chog rgyas pa ni 'di yin te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:303a-5: sems dpa' gang gi snying po dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:303a-8: rig pa rnams bzlas pa'i don du bsgrub par bya ba de ni bdag gam sems dpa' bsgoms na bsgrub par bya ba 'grub par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:303a-9: zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpas gsungs so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:303a-10: rigs thams cad kyi thun mong du bzlas pa'i chog rgyas pa rdzogs so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:303a-11: de nas rigs thams cad kyi thun mong du bsgrub pa'i cho ga rgyas pa ni 'di lta ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:303a-12: de la dang po kho nar de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi rigs kyi dngos grub ni 'di lta ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:303a-15: rig 'dzin nyid du 'grub pa dang; dngos grub chen po rnams so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:303a-16: de la nor 'grub pa ni 'di yin te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:303a-17: gang na gter yod par dvogs pa der phyag rgya bcings la rang gi ting nge 'dzin gyis gter gyi gnas der rdo rje blta bas lta ba na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:303a-18: ci ste rdo rje lta bu yang bar mthong na don gter yod par shes par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:303b-0: de nas rdo rje lcags sgrog gi dam tshig gi phyag rgya bcings te sa brkos @303b la ji ltar dga' ba bzhin du blangs na rtsod pa med par thob par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:303b-1: zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpas gsungs so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:303b-2: de la 'di ni rdzu 'phrul gyi dngos grub 'grub ba yin te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:303b-3: phyag rgya gang sgrub par byed na badzra siddhi zhes brjod par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:303b-4: rdzu 'phrul gyi dngos grub ni rnam pa bzhi yod de /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:303b-5: de ni 'di ltar chu'i steng nas phar 'gro zhing 'dug pa la sogs pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:303b-6: de bzhin gshegs pa la sogs pa thams cad kyi gzugs ston pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:303b-7: ji srid du dga' ba de srid du mi snang bar 'gyur ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:303b-8: nam mkha' la 'gro ba dang dpag tshad stong gi steng du lding ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:303b-10: phyogs thams cad du dpag tshad stong du ci dga' bar song la bskor te slar 'ong pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:303b-11: dpag tshad stong khor ra khor yug gi sems can thams cad kyi bsam pa shes pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:303b-12: dngos po thams cad mig gis mthong zhing rna bas thos pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:303b-13: phyogs thams cad du dpag tshad stong khor yug na gnas pa'i bud med thams cad ci dga' bar 'phang du blangs te 'dug pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:303b-16: mu tig la sogs ba'i dbyig thams cad dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:303b-17: nor thams cad phrogs nas kyang sus kyang chung zad kyang brgal mi nus te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:303b-18: bdag gi rdo rjes kyang mi thub par 'gyur na gzhan gyis lta smos kyang ci dgos /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:304a-1: bcu bsdoms pa'i stobs dang ldan pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:304a-2: rtag tu nad med pa dang ldan pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:304a-3: rtag tu 'dod pa thams cad la longs spyod pa dang ldan pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:304a-4: rtag tu dar la bab cing lha'i gzugs dang ldan pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:304a-5: rdo rje sems dpa' dang bcas pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad mthong zhing rdo rje'i dngos grub bla na med pas mchod pa byed cing lo stong phrag bcu bzhi'i bar 'tsho bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:304a-6: zhes bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje dngos grub kyis gsungs so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:304a-7: de la 'di ni rdo rje rig 'dzin gyi dngos grub 'grub pa yin te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:304a-8: phyag rgya bsgrub pa na rdo rje rig 'dzin ces brjod la 'grub pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:304a-9: rdo rje rig 'dzin gyis 'khor los bsgyur bar 'gyur te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:304a-10: 'dod pa thams cad la longs spyod pa dang ldan pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:304a-11: sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad du skad cig gis bskor te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:304a-12: slar 'ong zhing bde ba thams cad la yongs su spyad pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:304a-13: lo bco brgyad pa'i na tshod dang ldan pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:304a-14: skra 'khyil ba dang ldan pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:304a-15: rdo rje chen po'i rig 'dzin du gyur nas /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:304a-16: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang rdo rje sems dpa' thams cad mthong zhing bskal ba chen po'i bar du gnas par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:304a-17: zhes bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rig 'dzin gyis gsungs so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:304b-0: de la 'di ni @304b dngos grub chen po 'grub pa yin te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:304b-1: bdag nyid phyag rgya'i snying po don du bdag nyid kyis phyag rgya bsgrubs na sems dpa'i gzugs su gyur nas skad cig gcig gis kyang phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du gzugs sna tshogs kyis bya ba sna tshogs bye dpa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:304b-2: de bzhin gshegs pa rdo rje sems dpar bcas pa thams cad mthong nas rnam pa'i mchog thams cad dang ldan pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa'i mchod pas yang dag par mchod nas sems can ma lus zhing lus pa med pa rnams kyi don byas nas slar 'ongs te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:304b-3: 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyis rnam pa'i mchog thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'dod pa thams cad dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:304b-5: yid bde ba thams cad la spyod cing rdo rje sems dpa' dang mnyam pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen por gyur nas tshe'i tshad ma lus shing lus pa med pa'i bskal pa chen po'i tshad du 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:304b-6: zhes bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa'i thabs kyi dngos grub chen pos gsungs so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:304b-7: de la 'di ni rdo rje'i rigs kyi dngos grub ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:304b-8: de yang 'di ltar khams gsum las rnam par rgyal ba'i dngos grub dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:304b-9: dbang thams cad kyi dngos grub dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:304b-10: bde ba dang yid bde ba thams cad kyi dngos grub dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:304b-11: dngos grub dam pa rnams so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:305a-1: 'jig rten gsum las rnam par rgyal ba'i dngos grub yin te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:305a-2: khams gsum rnam par rgyal ba'i phyag rgya bcings la dbang phyug chen po rkang pa g-yon pas mnan te bsgrub par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:305a-3: de nas gzugs de skad 'byin pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:305a-4: h'um zhes bya ba brjod par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:305a-5: h'um zhes brjod pa tsam gyis dbang phyug chen po la sogs pa 'jig rten gsum po thams cad kyi bdag po 'khor dang bcas pa rnams sgrub pa'i mdun du bka' nyan cing dbang du 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:305a-6: de phyin chad 'jig rten gsum po thams cad kyi bdag po rdo rje 'dzin par 'gyur te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:305a-7: nam mkha' la 'gro zhing 'jig rten gsum po 'khor lo thams cad kun tu bskor te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:305a-8: slar 'ongs nas lha ma rungs pa la sogs pa sems can thams cad h'um zhes bya bas 'dul bar byed do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:305a-9: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje h'um zhes bya ba'i gzugs dang ldan pas 'jig rten gsum po thams cad la bka' stsol cing rdo rje sems dpar bcas pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad mthong nas mnyes par byed cing lo stong du 'tsho bar byed par 'gyur ro; ;bcom ldan 'das rdo rje h'um zhes byed pas gsungs so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:305a-10: de la 'di ni dbang thams cad kyi dngos grub ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:305b-0: phyag rgya bsgrub ba na de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad @305b kyi dbang bskur ba'i rin po che'i dam tshig gi phyag rgyas dang por bdag nyid dbang bskur la bsgrub par bya ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:305b-7: de la rdo rje'i dbang thob na de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje 'dzin par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:305b-8: rin po che'i dbang thob na rin po che thams cad kyi bdag por 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:305b-9: chos kyi dbang gis ni chos thams cad kyi rgyal por 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:305b-10: las kyi dbang gis ni 'jig rten las 'das pa'i las thams cad kyi dngos grub thob par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:305b-11: zhes bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dbang gis gsungs so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:305b-12: de la 'di ni bde ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:305b-13: yid bde ba thams cad kyi dngos grub ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:305b-14: de yang 'di ltar rtag tu gsang ba'i mchod pa rnams kyi de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la mchod pa byas na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:305b-15: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bde ba dang yid bde ba thams cad kyi dngos grub thob par 'gyur ro zhes bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bde ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:305b-16: yid bde ba thams cad kyis gsungs so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:305b-17: de la 'di ni dngos grub dam pa ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:305b-18: de yang ji ltar rdo rje 'dzin pa dang bdag mnyam mo zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin apas gsungs so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:306a-0: de la 'di dag ni padma'i rigs kyi @306a *//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:306a-2: de ni 'di ltar mnyes par bya ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:306a-6: de la mnyes par bya ba'i dngos grub ni 'di yin te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:306a-7: ji ltar padma 'dod pa bsgoms na de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la sogs pa sems can thams cad mnyes par byed nus par 'gyur ro; ;bdag nyid 'jig rten dbang phyug rjes su dran par byas na sems can thams cad dbang du byed nus par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:306a-8: byams pas 'gengs pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyis 'gro pa thams cad bsrung ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:306a-11: bdag nyid padma'i ting nge 'dzin du zhugs la padma lag par blangs te bsgrubs na 'jig rten dbang phyug gi gzugs dang ldan pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:306a-12: rnam pa'i mchog thams cad dang ldan zhing lo stong phrag bzhir 'tsho bar 'gyur ro zhes bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi padmas gsungs so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:306a-13: de la 'di dag ni nor bu'i rigs kyi dngos grub rnams te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:306a-14: de yang 'di ltar rigs thams cad kyi dbang gi dngos grub dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:306a-16: bsam pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs pa dang rin po che'i dngos grub rnams so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:306a-17: de la de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dbang gi dngos grub ni 'di lta ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:306b-0: nyid kyis @306b dbang dbul ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:306b-2: ci nus kyis sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par bya ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:306b-3: rin po che bsgrub pa'i dngos grub 'di dag gis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad mchod na ring po mi thogs par 'grub par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:306b-4: zhes bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rin po ches gsungs so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:306b-5: rigs thams cad kyi thun mong pa'i dngos grub kyi cho ga rgyas pa rdzogs so ////
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:306b-6: de nas rtog pa thams cad kyi thabs kyi dngos grub kyi rgyud bshad par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:306b-7: zhes bcom ldan 'das thog ma dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:306b-8: tha ma med pa'i sems dpas gsungs so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:306b-9: de la dang po kho nar ni snying po thams cad kyi dngos grub kyi rgyud de /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:306b-12: de yi thabs ni phyag rgya ste //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:306b-13: dngos grub chen po kun sbyin no //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:306b-14: de la 'di ni phyag rgya'i thabs kyi dngos grub kyi rgyud de /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:306b-16: phyag rgya'i dngos grub chags las skyes //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:306b-17: de yi thabs ni bsgom pa ste //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:306b-18: dngos grub kun gyi mchog tu 'gyur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:306b-19: de la 'di ni sngags kyi thabs kyi dngos grub kyi rgyud de /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:306b-21: sngags kyi dngos grub thob mi 'gyur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:306b-22: spros pa med pa'i thabs kyis ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:306b-23: dngos grub kun gyi mchog tu 'gyur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:307a-0: de la 'di ni rig pa thams @307a *//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:307a-1: cad dngos grub kyi rgyud do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:307a-2: ma rig mun chags 'di la ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:307a-3: rig pa'i dngos grub yod min te //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:307a-4: de yi thabs ni rgya che ba //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:307a-5: dngos grub kun gyi mchog thob bo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:307a-6: rtog pa thams cad kyi dngos grub kyi rgyud do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:307a-7: de nas rtog pa thams cad kyi bsod nams kyi dngos grub kyi rgyud bshad par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:307a-8: zhes bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis gsungs so //

K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:307a-10: mchod pa rnam bzhi byas nas ni; ;bsod nams chen po thob 'gyur te //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:307a-11: bsod nams med kyang sangs rgyas mchod //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:307a-13: de la 'di ni phyag rgya'i bsod nams kyi dngos grub kyi rgyud de /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:307a-14: dam tshig gsang ba bsrungs na ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:307a-15: bsod nams chen po thob 'gyur te //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:307a-16: bsod nams med kyang myur bar ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:307a-17: dam tshig bsrungs na myur du 'grub //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:307a-18: de la 'di ni sngags kyi bsod nams kyi dngos grub kyi rgyud de /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:307a-19: sangs rgyas mtshan la sogs brjod na //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:307a-20: bsod nams chen po thob 'gyur te //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:307a-21: bsod nams med kyang myur bar ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:307a-22: chos sbyin pas ni dngos grub 'thob //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:307a-23: de la 'di ni rig pa'i bsod nams kyi dngos grub kyi rgyud de /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:307a-24: bsod nams nang na sbyin pa mchog /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:307b-0: @307b byin na bsod nams thob 'gyur te //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:307b-1: spyin pa'i pha rol phyin rdzogs na //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:307b-2: myur du sangs rgyas nyid du 'grub //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:307b-3: rtog pa thams cad kyi bsod nams kyi dngos grub kyi rgyud do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:307b-4: de nas rtog pa thams cad kyi shes rab kyi dngos grub kyi rgyud bshad par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:307b-5: zhes bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis gsungs so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:307b-6: de la dang po kho nar snying po shes rab kyi dngos grub kyi rgyud de /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:307b-7: yi ge aa la 'jug byed cing //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:307b-8: yi ge thams cad rnam bsgoms la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:307b-9: rang gi kha nas gzhan zhal du //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:307b-10: bsgoms na bsod nams thob par 'gyur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:307b-11: zhes bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' chen po 'jam pa'i dpal gyis gsungs so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:307b-12: de la 'di ni phyag rgya'i shes rab kyi dngos grub kyi rgyud de /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:307b-13: shes rab nges 'bigs zhes bya ba //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:307b-14: ting nge 'dzin ces grags pa ste //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:307b-15: des ni phyag rgya myur 'grub par //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:307b-17: zhes bcom ldan 'das shes rab mchog gis gsungs so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:307b-18: de la 'di sngags kyi shes rab kyi dngos grub kyi rgyud de /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:307b-19: shes rab sgra yi rjes 'brang ba //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:307b-20: ting 'dzin tshig ni rab spros pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:307b-21: de bsgoms na ni myur ba yang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:307b-22: sngags kyi dngos grub thob par 'gyur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:307b-23: zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje blos gsungs so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:308a-0: de la 'di ni rig pa'i shes rab kyi dngos grub kyi @308a *//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:308a-2: rig dang sngags dang khyad par du //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:308a-3: khyad par yod pa ma yin te //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:308a-4: shes rab bsgoms na myur bar ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:308a-5: nges par dngos grub thob par 'gyur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:308a-6: zhes bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi shes rab kyi ye shes kyis gsungs so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:308a-7: rtog pa thams cad kyi ye shes kyi dngos grub kyi chog rgyas pa'i rgyud do //

K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:308a-9: zhes bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rjes gsungs so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:308a-10: de la dang po kho nar snying po thams cad tshogs kyi dngos grub kyi rgyud de /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:308a-11: mchod pa thams cad rab byas na //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:308a-12: dge ba yi ni chos rnams kyi //

K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:308a-16: 'khor lo mang por zhugs pa dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:308a-17: dkyil 'khor mang por bris pa'i phyir //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:308a-18: tshogs rdzogs pas na phyag rgya rnams //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:308a-19: dngos grub chen po thob par 'gyur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:308a-20: de la 'di ni sngags kyi tshogs kyi dngos grub kyi rgyud de /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:308a-21: rjes su yi rang la sogs tshul //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:308a-22: de bzhin dam pa'i chos bklags dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:308a-23: bzlas pa mang po byas nas ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:308a-24: nges par sngags kyi dngos grub 'gyur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:308a-25: de la 'di ni rig pa'i tshogs kyi dngos grub kyi rgyud de /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:308b-0: ma rig rab @308b tu slangs pa dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:308b-1: sbyin pa'i pha rol phyin tshul las //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:308b-2: tshogs ni yongs su rdzogs nas kyang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:308b-3: myur du dngos grub thob par 'gyur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:308b-4: rtog pa thams cad kyi cho ga rgyas ba'i rgyud rdzogs so ////
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:308b-5: de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rjes rigs thams cad kyi mtshan ma byung ba'i ye shes kyi dngos grub kyi rgyud 'di gsungs so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:308b-6: de la ji ltar rdo rje 'byung zhe na //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:308b-7: de nyid bcom ldan sems dpa' ste //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:308b-8: thams cad sems de nyid bdag po //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:308b-9: sku dang gsung thugs rdo rje ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:308b-10: sems dpa' brtan pa rang byung gi /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:308b-11: sems dpa' kun gyi mchog sems dpa'//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:308b-12: rdo rje snying gar rab bsgoms na //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:308b-13: rdo rje sems dpa' zhes grags te //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:308b-14: 'di la rdo rje rab tu gnas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:308b-15: de nyid sangs rgyas rnams kyi ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:308b-16: ye shes tshul te mnyam med 'od //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:308b-17: snying las sna tshogs byung nas ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:308b-18: sna tshogs pa yi gzugs gyur te //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:308b-19: khams gsum kun gyi rdul snyed du //

K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:308b-22: rdo rje sems dpar yang dag 'gyur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:308b-23: sems dpa' dang po de nyid las //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:308b-24: mtshan ma thams cad yang dag 'byung //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:308b-25: mtshan ma las ni sems dpa' che //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:308b-27: gang gis 'di ni thos gyur la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:308b-28: dad cing 'dzin byed snying gar yang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:309a-1: na ni; ;de ni myur du grub pa thob /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:309a-2: ces bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dang sa gsungs so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:309a-3: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi de kho na nyid 'byung ba'i ye shes kyi cho ga rgyas pa'i rgyud do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:309a-4: de nas byang chub sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rje rtog pa thams cad 'byung ba'i ye shes kyi cho ga rgyas pa'i rgyud 'di gsungs so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:309a-5: de la dang po kho nar de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rtog pa 'byung ba'i ye shes kyi rgyud ni 'di yin te /

K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:309a-7: ye shes rtag pa nyid gyur pa'i //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:309a-8: mi rtog pa yi ye shes las //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:309a-9: brtags pas rtog pa zhes brjod do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:309a-10: de la 'di ni bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs kyi rtog pa 'byung ba'i ye shes kyi rgyud de /

K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:309a-16: rtog pa grub sbyin zhes brtags pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:309a-17: rtog las bral ba'i bdag nyid kyis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:309a-18: de phyir rtog pa zhes gsungs so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:309a-19: de la 'di ni padma'i rigs kyi rtog pa 'byung ba'i ye shes kyi rgyud de /

K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:309a-23: grub pa nyid du de 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:309b-0: de la 'di @309b ni nor bu'i rigs kyi rtog pa 'byung ba'i ye shes kyi rgyud de /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:309b-1: rtog pa med pa'i nor bu ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:309b-2: mthu yis shin tu mchog tu 'gyur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:309b-3: de ltar rnam par mi rtog pas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:309b-5: zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpas gsungs so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:309b-6: rigs thams cad kyi rtog pa 'byung ba'i rgyud do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:309b-7: de nas rtog pa thams cad kyi snying po 'byung ba'i ye shes kyi rgyud de /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:309b-10: ting 'dzin sgrub pa snying la gnas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:309b-11: de phyir snying po zhes brjod do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:309b-12: de nas rtog pa thams cad kyi phyag rgya 'byung ba'i ye shes kyi rgyud de /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:309b-13: ji ltar rgyal po'i phyag rgya mchog /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:309b-14: khrims ni 'da' ka mi phyed bzhin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:309b-15: bdag nyid chen po gzugs brnyan gyis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:309b-16: mtshan ma phyag rgya zhes par grags //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:309b-17: de nas rtog pa thams cad kyi spags 'byung ba'i ye shes kyi rgyud de /

K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:316b-0: ri rab ri'i rtse mo nas snying po byang chub gang na ba der gshegs nas ched du bcom ldan @316b 'das kyi byang chub kyi shing drung du 'jig rten pa dang mthun par bya ba'i phyir rtsva blangs nas ched du brjod pa 'di ched du brjod do //

K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:317a-4: de nas 'jig rten gsum pa mtha' dag gi bdag po dbang phyug chen pos lha rnams kyi bdag po mthu bo che la sogs pa la 'di skad ces smras so //

K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:317a-8: 'di ltar 'jig rten na de bzhin gshegs pa ma yin no snyam du shes par ma byed cig /

K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:317b-12: ci ste bdag cag gis nus par gyur na bdag cag nyid yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas par 'gyur ro //

K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:318a-11: bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas su mngon par sangs rgyas nas sems can gyi khams ma lus shing lus pa med pa thams cad la phan par mdzad pa 'phags pa phyag na rdo rje rang gi thugs la zhugs pa la mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad pa 'das mngon par bstod do //

K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:318b-6: rdo rje rin chen rgyal po che //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:318b-7: dbang bskur bzang po bdag po che //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:318b-8: rin chen thams cad mdzes pa che //

K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:318b-15: rgyal mtshan che bas nor rab gtong //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:318b-16: nam mkha'i rgyal mtshan yu ba che //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:318b-17: gtong ba'i mtshan khyod phyag 'tshal lo //

K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:318b-19: dgyes pa che zhing rab dgyes pa //

K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:318b-23: sems dpa'i chos ni rab sbyor ba //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:318b-24: sangs rgyas chos te chos rab mchog /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:318b-26: rdo rje rnon po ral gri che //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:318b-27: shes rab ye shes blo gros che //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:318b-28: sdig gcod ral gri chen po ste //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:318b-29: sangs rgyas mtshon khyod phyag 'tshal lo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:318b-30: rdo rje rgyu ste 'khor lo che; ;sangs rgyas 'khor lo gter chen po //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:318b-31: dkyil 'khor kun te chos kyi mchog /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:318b-33: rdo rje gsung ba gsung ba che //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:319a-2: yi ge med pa bzlas pa che //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:319a-3: sangs rgyas gsung khyod phyag 'tshal lo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:319a-4: rdo rje las te las rab mchog /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:319a-5: las chen las rab byed pa ste gsang ba'i mchod pa mchod pa che //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:319a-6: sangs rgyas mchog khyod phyag 'tshal lo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:319a-7: rdo rje srung ba go cha che //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:319a-8: go cha'i mchog ste brtan pa che //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:319a-9: srung ba che zhing snying po che //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:319a-11: rdo rje gnod sbyin khro bo che //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:319a-12: ma rungs thams cad skrag byed pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:319a-13: sangs rgyas kun gyi thabs chen te //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:319a-14: bsrung ba mchog khyod phyag 'tshal lo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:319a-15: rdo rje bsdams pa phyag 'tshal lo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:319a-16: dam tshig chen po bcing ba che //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:319a-17: khu tshur chen po phyag rgya che //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:319a-18: rdo rje khu tshur khyod phyag 'tshal //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:319a-19: de bzhin gshegs pa phyag bya zhing; ;brjod de mchod de bsti stang bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:319a-20: gang phyir thog ma tha ma med //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:319a-21: byang chub sems ni khyod yin te //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:319a-22: khyod la brten na rgyal ba dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:319a-23: dpa' bo byang chub sems dpa' kun; ;byung zhing yang dag 'byung 'gyur bas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:319a-24: sangs rgyas byang chub mchog gi rgyu //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:319a-25: rdo rje sems dpa' khyod phyag 'tshal //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:319a-26: rdo rje rin chen khyod phyag 'tshal //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:319a-27: rdo rje chos khyod phyag 'tshal lo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:319a-28: rdo rje las ni khyod phyag 'tshal //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:319a-29: yang dag par ni phyag 'tshal zhing //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:319a-30: mtshan mchog gis ni khyod bstod pa'i //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:319b-0: bsod nams gang yin de kun @319b kyang; ;sangs rgyas byang chub thob par shog /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:319b-1: mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad dam pa ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:319b-2: rab dad pas ni lan gcig tsam //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:319b-3: gang gis legs par brjod pa ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:319b-4: kun kyang sangs rgyas nyid du 'gyur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:319b-5: zhes sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:319b-6: de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rje la de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad gcig tu 'dus te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:319b-7: gsung gcig tu legs so zhes bya ba de byin no //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:319b-8: rdo rje theg pa bla na med //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:319b-9: de bzhin gshegs pa kun gyi gsang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:319b-10: theg pa chen po mngon 'dus pa'i //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:319b-11: mdo 'di legs par bshad pas na //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:319b-12: rdo rje sems dpa' khyod legs so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:319b-13: rdo rje rin chen khyod legs so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:319b-14: rdo rje chos ni khyod legs so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:319b-15: rdo rje las ni khyod kyang legs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:319b-16: bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:319b-18: 'phags pa byang chub sems dpar dam bcas pa rang gi thugs la zhugs pa thams cad dgyes shing mnyes nas bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpas gsungs pa la mngon par dgyes par gyur to //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:319b-19: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi de kho na nyid bsdus pa zhes [?] phya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo rgyud nye bar bsdus pa dang bcas pa rdzogs so ////
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:319b-20: rgyud 'di la 'gyur byang mi snang na'ang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:319b-21: pandi ta shraddh'a ka ra warmma dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-002:320a-1: lo tstsha ba dge slong rin chen bzang pos bsgyur bar grags so //
